src_text: The G7 is an intergovernmental political forum consisting of Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United Kingdom and the United States  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno ke karolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Pakagare (MSTF) 2019-.

src_text: Draft Legal Sector Code (Draft LSC).
tgt_text: MTSF 2019-2024 ke leano la go diragatsa tiro bile gape le disa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya go dira gore re diragatse Leano la Tlhabololo ya Naga leng Ponelopele ya 2030 e ka ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di tshwanetseng go fitlhelelwa mo pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Draft LSC for public comment.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno di bua ka dikarolo tse di botlhokwa di le supa tsa puso leng (1) Phetogo ya ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro; (2) Thuto, bokgoni le boitekanelo; (3) Go tiisa megolo ya go thusa baagi ka ditirelo tsa motheo tse di ikanyegang le tsa boleng; (4) Kgolaganyo ya dibaka, bonno le pusoselegae; (5) Go nna seoposengwe le go babalela baagi; (6) Mmuso o nang le bokgoni o nang le maitsholo a siameng le o tlisang tlhabologo; le (7) Aforika o botoka le lefatshe le le botoka, gammogo le dikgato tsa go tlisa tharabololo tse di tshwanang le tse di tlhalositsweng tsa pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e dirilweng mo dintlheng tse di neng di beilweng tsa paka e sekasekwang.

src_text: The objectives of these codes are to facilitate the transformation of the legal sector to achieve representation as per the country’s demographics.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape nopotse le dintlha tse go santseng go saletswe morago mo go tsona ka ntlha ya leroborobo la COVID-19 tse go tlhokwang gore go samaganwe le tsona..     Ditona di tla tshwara dikopano le bobegakgang mo dibekeng tse di tlang go tlhalosa ka botlalo se dipegelo tseno di buang ka sona mmogo le go neelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga dintlha tse di santseng di tlhoka go gagamadiwa     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: The code will also ensure the development of the body that will produce well-trained and competent providers of legal services.
tgt_text: Khonferense ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle (BIEC).

src_text: The development of the Draft LSC was overseen by the Legal Practice Council statutory body established in terms of Section 4 of the Legal Practice Act, 2014 (Act 28 of 2014) and guided by the Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment Act (B-BBEE), 2013 (Act 46 of 2013).
tgt_text: BIEC ya ntlha tla tshwarelwa kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Sandton kwa Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Phukwi.

src_text: The B-BBEE Act of 2013 provides for the Minister of Trade, Industry and Competition to issue codes of good practice on black economic empowerment in the specific sectors.
Members of the legal profession currently do not have sector code to guide them in addressing the imbalances and inequalities in the legal profession.
tgt_text: Khonferense eno tshwarwa morago ga gore puso ngwaga ono sa le gale thankgolole Lephata la Kemonokeng ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle, le maitlhomo lona leng go tshegetsa beng ba diintaseteri ba bathobantsho gore ba kgone go rekisetsa mebaraka mentšhwa, le go thusiwa ka ditšhelete tsa dikgwebo tse di gwebang le dinaga tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go thusiwa le ka dirala tsa go bapatsa dikgwebo tsa bona     Molaetsa.

src_text: The Draft LSC will be published in the Government Gazette for 60 days to allow for public comments..  Biannual performance progress reports.
tgt_text: DikakgoloKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: Springboks, ka phenyo e gapileng maikutlo ya motsotso wa bofelo kgatlhanong le Wales ka nako ya motshameko wa ntlha wa meraro ya teko kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Loftus Versveld kwa Tshwane ka Lamatlhatso, 2 Phukwi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the biannual performance progress reports for the period covering October 2021 to March.
tgt_text: Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya bona ya dino di le pedi go le nngwe mo motshamekong wa bona wa pulo ya metshameko ya Sejana sa Metshameko ya Kgwele ya Dinao ya Basadi sa Dinaga tsa Aforika kgatlhanong le Nigeria e tshwaretsweng kwa nageng ya Morocco, ka Mosupologo, 4 Phukwi     Go Thapiwa    Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang..     Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana jaaka Modulasetilo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dilothari..     Moatefokate Rory Voller jaaka Mokhomišinara wa khomišene ya Dithoto le Dithata tsa Ditlamo (CIPC).

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke puso go samagana le mathata motlakase naga.

src_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno tsa botlhokwa di tlhagola tsela ya go fokotsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase, go fetola lephata la motlakase le go dira gore setlwaedi sa go tlhaela motlakase nne selo sa mo malobeng.

src_text: In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..
tgt_text: Go tshegetsa mafaratlhatlha motlakase le go thusa naga ya rona gore se imelwe ke tlamelo ya motlakase, re tlhoka go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase ya setšhaba ka dimekawate di le 600 mo dikgweding di le tharo tse di tlang..   Malapa ka nna le seabe mo go somareleng motlakase ka go tima mabone a sa dirisiweng le didiriswa tsa motlakase tse di jang motlakase montsi ka dinako tse motlakase dirisiwang ka bontsi.

src_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.
tgt_text: Dikgwebo di rotloediwa go dirisa thekenoloji e sa diriseng motlakase montsi mo ditirong tsa tsona tsa tlhagiso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tsa go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase..   Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse kgatelopele e dirilweng ka fa tlase ga Operation Vulindlela ya go tlosa dikgoreletsi mo maphateng motlakase mafaratlhatlha ditlhaeletsano, le metsi le bojanala mo go tsosolosenga ikonomi.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.
tgt_text: Go fitlheletswe diphetogo tsa ikonomi di le robongwe go tswa mo go di le 26, mme mo diphetogong di le 11 go na le kgatelopele e namatshang.

src_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.
tgt_text: Dikatlego di akaretsa go oketsa palo ya dilaesense tsa tlhagiso e golaganeng le phatlalatso, go fetolelwa ga Bothati jwa Maemelakepe Bosetšhaba Transnet go nna setlamo se se ikemetseng, go gololwa ga lenane le le sekasekilweng la dikgono tsa botlhokwa le tsenyotirisong ya tsamaiso ya e-Visa mo dinageng di le 14, go akarediwa mebaraka megolo mentšhwa ya bajanala tshwana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..   Go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Batho ba Bomme (GBVF).

src_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Kabinete gagamaditswe tota ke ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tsa mo malobeng tsa go betelelwa ga basadi ba le robedi kwa Krugersdorp, kwa Gauteng.

src_text: Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauteng.
tgt_text: Ditiragatso tseno tse di bosula le tsa go bogisa batho ba bomme di nyatsa botho ba rona.

src_text: These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabric.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse gape le Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa ka go tshwara ka bonako babelaelwa ba le mmalwa malebana le tiragalo eno e setlhogo..     Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dirisana le sepodisi ka go ba loma tsebe gongwe go ba begela ka ditiragalo tse di belaetsang.

src_text: Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of number of suspects in connection with the heinous crime..
tgt_text: Fa re dira mmogo, re ka dira gore mo metseng re tswang kwa go yona basadi le bana ba rona ba nne ba babalesegile..     MoAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe na le maikarabelo go tsaya dikgato tsa molao kgatlhanong le ditlhokotsebe.

src_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activities.
tgt_text: Bega ditiragalo tsotlhe tse di amanang le GBVF kwa seteišeneng sa mapodisi sa kgaolo o nnang kwa go yona gongwe letsetse nomoro ya mahala ya Crime Stop: mo go 08600 10111, gongwe letsetse Tikwatikwe ya Bosetšhaba ya go Lwantshana le GBVF: mog go 0800 428 428 gongwe letsetse Mogala wa Thuso ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa ga Batho ba Bomme: mo go 0800 150. .

src_text: Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and children..  Every South African has duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the law.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.

src_text: Report all GBVF-related incidents to local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150.  .
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phatwe tlotla basadi ba ba nnileng le seabe mo kgaratlhong ya kgololesego le basadi botlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona..   Kgwedi ya Basadi monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ditshwanelo le Maatlafatso ya Basadi mo Ikonoming le mo Setšhabeng: Re aga Botoka go Tokafatsa go Tsosologa ga Basadi”..   Basadi ba feta 20 000 ba ba gwantetseng kwa Union Buildings kwa Pretoria ka la bo 9 Phatwe 1956 ba akgetse mo go netefatseng gore tekatekano ya bong le maatlafatso di tswelela go nna ditlapele tse botlhokwa mo Aforika Borweng wa temokerasi.

src_text: Women’s Month.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa bona tsa bopelokgale di rotloeditse basadi ka kakaretso go tsaya manno a ba siametseng mo Palamenteng, mo pusong le mo setšhabeng, mme re tswelela go agelela mo ditswelelopeleng tseno fa sale re bona kgololesego ka.

src_text: The annual Women’s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our society..
tgt_text: Segopotso sa Marikana.

src_text: This year’s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme: “Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..
tgt_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phatwe 2022, puso tshwaragane le naga yotlhe go ikgopotsa matlhotlhapelo a diragetseng kwa Marikana kwa Bokone Bophirima ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains key priority in democratic South Africa.
tgt_text: Kutlobotlhoko e utlwilweng ke badiri, bamalapa bona le setšhaba ka kakaretso tla nna le mo hisetoring ya rona..   Lenaneo la Ntšhwafatso ya Marikana le tsentswe tirisong go aga sešwa le go dira gore go nne le seemo se se kgontshang go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba Marikana.

src_text: Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in.
tgt_text: Ngogola puso duetse R176 milione le tlhatswadiatla ya malapa batswasetlhabelo mme go solofetswe gore dikgetse tse di setseng ga jaana tse di mo dikgatong tsa semolao di konosediwe kwa bokhutlong jwa Phatwe.

src_text: Marikana commemoration.
tgt_text: Go neetswe batlholagadi ba Marikana matlo le mmalwa a ntšhwafaditsweng le a rekilweng mme mangwe tla konosediwa monongwaga.

src_text: On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in.
tgt_text: Porojeke ya matlo ya R700 milione tla dira gore badiri ba meepo ba tlamelwe ka matlo a nang le seriti.

src_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our history..
tgt_text: Go tlamelwa ka mafaratlhatlha botlhokwa loago go tokafatsa seemo sa botshelo sa baagi ba kwa meepong.

src_text: The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana community.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Tshwaretsweng kwa Gauteng e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo mo Dikgaolong (DDM).

src_text: Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this year R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housing.
tgt_text: Go latela katlego ya di-Imbizo tsa Moporesidente di le tharo tse di neng di tshwaretswe kwa Bokone Bophirima, Foreisetata le Mpumalanga, ka tatelano ya tsona, Lekgotlatoropo la Kgaolo la Sedibeng kwa Gauteng le ne la amogela legato la bone ka Labotlhano, 12 Phatwe..   Ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baemedi ba batlhankedibagolwane go tswa kwa pusong ya bosetšhaba, ya porofense le ya selegae.

src_text: Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communities.
tgt_text: MaAforika Borwa go tswa kwa maphateng a farologaneng ne rotloediwa go dira mmogo kgatlhanong le seelo se se golang sa lehuma le khumanego tse di bakwang ke maemo a gwetlhang ikonomi..   Kgaolo ya Sedibeng nnile le tswelelopele ka go dirisa Kgaolo ya Ikonomi e Kgethegileng ya Vaal River (SEZ) e nang le bokgoni jwa go fetolela kgaolo eo, porofense le naga go nna ya madirelo gape.

Maikaelelo Vaal River SEZ ke go amogela maphata a latelang botlhokwa: Vaal River Smart City ntšhwa, Kutla ya Green Hydrogen Innovation; kutla ya motekwane/khanabisi; tsamaiso ya dithoto tsa temothuo (agro-logistics); eroteropolisi; boemelafofanepotlana; thomelothoto ka difofane le lephata le le tsosolositsweng la tlhagiso ya tshipi.

src_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng.

Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August..
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso.

src_text: Under the theme: “Leave no one behind”, President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local governments.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 4 go fitlha ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Go Diragatsa Dikgato tsa go Tshwaraganya Setšhaba go Dira gore Baagi ba nne le Seabe mo Ditiragalong tsa go tswa Baagi Thuso tse di Nang le Seabe mo Ikonoming” kopantse batho botlhe ba ba amegang go tswa kwa dikhutlong tsotlhe tsa naga tse di nang le seabe mo mererong ya mothale ono, gore ba tle go dirisana mmogo le puso go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi mme gareng ga maikemisetso mangwe mantsi, le go batlela mekgatlho ya go ema baagi nokeng didirisiwa tsotlhe tse di tlhokang go thusa baagi..     Samiti sekasekane le dipegelo tsa dipuisano go tswa kwa diporofenseng di le robongwe malebana le dikgwetlho tsa tsona, tse di akareditseng tlamelo ya matlole, matsapa melawanataolo, go fetola lekala la go tswa baagi thuso ka maikaelelo go dira gore go nne le tirisanommogo magareng ga puso le mekgatlo ya baagi go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di amanang le lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatiro..   Kabinete ikuetse kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi le mo baaging go nna le seabe se se tlhaga go netefatsa gore re aga isago e botoka, jaaka go elediwa mo Leanong la Tlhabololo ya Naga: Mo ponelopeleng ya   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic conditions..
tgt_text: Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi.

src_text: The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and country.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi gore tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing sector.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tsepamisitse mogopolo mo tirong ntle ya ditshwantsho le dibidio; ya go bopa le go betla; ya dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le ya metlotlo; ya ditirelo tsa mebetlo le tsa boitlhamedi; ya go diragatsa le ya go keteka, go akarediwa le ya mmino, ya go phasalatsa le ya dikgatiso..   Leano leno le tla tswela maphata ano mosola mo go direng gore re nne le lekala le le fetogileng le le kgonang go itlhamela le go itshimololela dilo le le tla tlhomphiwang mo lefatsheng le go gaisana le mangwe mo lekaleng leno.
Le tla tswela mosola intaseteri ya boitlhamedi ya Aforika Borwa gore kgone go fitlhelela mebaraka ya ka fa nageng le ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.

The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.

src_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.

src_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tseno tota di mo karolong ya madi dikadimo mo leanong leno.

src_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.
tgt_text: Mo dikarolong tseno, go tshitshintswe gore go atisewe paka ya go duelela madi a adimilweng gore tsamaelana le paka ya tse dingwe tsa dithoto tse di rekilweng ka tšhelete eo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementation.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tseno gape di tlhalosa seabe sa ditheo tsa ditšhelete tsa tlhabololo mo go adimeng dimasepala matlole.

src_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..
tgt_text: Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 naya dimasepala dithata tsa go adima tšhelete ya ditshenyegelo tsa tsona.

src_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the space.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la ntlhantlha le amogetswe ke Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2000 go kaela Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international markets..
tgt_text: Maitlhomo dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa ke go dira gore baadimi ba bangwe ba bantsinyana mo mebasepaleng ba bone merokotso fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe di tswelela go se setise dintlha tse di botlhokwa tsa dikadimo tsa dimasepala..   Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.

src_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.

src_text: Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara nngwe le nngwe di ka phasaladiwa.

src_text: The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.
tgt_text: Seno ke go fetola nako gore se tshwane le ya mo ngwageng o fetileng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa naga.

src_text: Amongst the amendments   proposed introducing longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being financed.
tgt_text: Nako e tshitshintsweng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi pele ga nako ke Phatwe 2022 malebana le kotara ya ntlha le Ngwanaitseele 2022 malebana le kotara ya bobedi.

src_text: The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone di tla phasaladiwa ka Tlhakole le Motsheganong 2023, ka tatelano ya tsona..   Go Khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD).

src_text: Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditure.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse kgato ya go khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD) jaaka ne ya tsenngwa tirisong morago ga merwalela e sentseng thata kwa Kapa Botlhaba le KwaZulu-Natal..   NSoD khutlile ka la bo 18 Phatwe 2022 go latela gore atolosediwe nako ka la bo 18 Phukwi.

src_text: The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).
tgt_text: Go atolosediwa nako gono ne le ka ntlha ya fa go ne go santse go na le tlhokagalo ya gore go tswelele go tshegetsa dikgato tse di leng teng tsa go samagana le ditiragalo tse di diragaditsweng ke dikarolo tsa puso go fokotsa le go samagana le ditlamorago tsa ditiragalo tsa ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo ka ntlha ya maemo bosa kwa diporofenseng tse di amegileng..   Kabinete dumelane gore maemo ga jaana ga sa tlhole tlhoka gore go nne le dikgato tse di kgethegileng ka ntlha ya fa dikarolo tsa puso, lephata la poraefete le baagi ba tla kgona go netefatsa gore ba tsweletsa dikgato tsa go thusa, go busetsa sekeng le go aga sešwa   Melaotlhomo.

src_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa ngwaga wa 2020 ka romelwa kwa Palamenteng gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats release.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka Seetebosigo 2020 ne ya letlelela gore molaotlhomo ono ka romelwa lekgetlo le lengwe gape kwa baaging gore ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

src_text: This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the country.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di tla dira gore ditshwanelo tsa go nna le lefatshe nne selo sa boammaruri se se sireleditsweng semolao ke Karolo ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono dira gore jaanong go kokoanngwa ga dipalopalo malebana le lotso, bosetšhaba le boagi jwa batshodi ba ditshwanelo tsa lefatshe mo Aforika Borwa nne selo se se kgonagalang.

src_text: Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).
tgt_text: Kgaolo eno tla dira gore mo isagong go nne bonolo go kwala dipegelo tse di nepagetseng tsa boruni jwa lefatshe le tsa tshekatsheko ya lefatshe fa re lekola diphetogo mo go nneng beng ba lefatshe..   Molaotlhomo wa Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlamelo tsa Metsi (NWRIA) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo wa NWRIA wa 2022 ka phasaladiwa sebaka sa malatsi le 90 gore setšhaba se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga ona.

src_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe setheo sa NWRIA se se tla rwalang maikarabelo go rulaganya, go tlamela ka ditšhelete le go tlhabolola mafaratlhatlha metsi mo nageng.

src_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected provinces..
tgt_text: Gape se tla bo se na le maikarabelo go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a leng teng metsi.

src_text: Cabinet agreed that current circumstances no longer warrant the extraordinary measures as organs of state, the private sector and civil society will continue to ensure ongoing relief, recovery and reconstruction  Bills.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla tshwanela ke go netefatsa gore go nna le tlamelo e sa kgaotseng ya metsi e rebolang metsi ka go lekalekana le e go tsamaisana le maitlamo molaotheo gore batho ba tshwanetswe go tlamelwa ka metsi le tikologo e babalesegileng mme itekanetse.

src_text: Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla tlhomiwa go nna Setheo sa Puso ka fa tlase ga Šejule 2 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Puso, wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 1 wa 1999).

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla rwala ditiro tse ga jaana di rwelweng ke Bothati jwa Trans-Caledon Tunnel..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultation.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa 2022 isiwe kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono baakanya Molao wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007)..     Dikarolo tseno tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di laola maatla dimasepala go lefisa ditefiso tsa tlhabololo malebana le dikopo tsa tlhabololo ya lefatshe tse di neelwang dimasepala.

src_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tseno di tla netefatsa gore dimasepala di dirisa ditefiso tseno kwa ntle ga go tsaya letlhakore, kwa ntle ga bofitlha le ka tshwanelo.

src_text: This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownership..  National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2020 neile tetla ya gore Molaotlhomo ono ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..     Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore Melao le supa kwalolwe sešwa leng (1) Molao wa Letlole la Diphenšene la Ditheo tse di Dirang Tiro ya Mothale oo, wa ngwaga wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41, wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole, wa ngwaga wa 1976 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Badiri ba Puso wa ngwaga wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Khomišene ya Ditšhelete le Taolo ya Matlole, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1996); (5) Molao wa Banka ya Lefatshe le Tlhabololo ya Temothuo, wa ngwaga wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2021, (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).

src_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di akaretsa tse di leng ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole wa 1996, tse di ka ga go akarediwa mo diphenšeneng tsa masole balekane ba masole gore le bona ba natholelwe ditshiamelo tsa bona mme go tla tsewa gore seno se tla diragadiwa go tloga ka letlha la bo 27 Moranang.

src_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa melao ya diphenšene di tla dira gore ka gangwe balekane ba masole ba natholelwe merokotso ya diphenšene fa ba tswa mo kgolaganong ya lenyalo.

src_text: The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga go sedifatsa seabe sa Tona ya Ditšhelete mo boruning, ntlha nngwe e kwalolotsweng sešwa ke e mabapi le go oketsa dithata tsa komiti ya kgalemo ya baruni fa moruni amogetse molato.

src_text: The agency will take on the functions that are currently performed by the Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono phasaladitswe ka Ferikgong 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono ke Molaotlhomo o kwalolang sešwa letlotlo la Melao e farologaneng leng  Molao wa Setheo sa go Lwantsha Bogodu jwa Ditšhelete, wa ngwaga wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Ditheo tse di sa Direng Letseno, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Dithoto tsa Terasete, wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1998); (iv) Molao wa Ditlamo, wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao wa Lephata la Melawana ya Ditšhelete wa ngwaga wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017).

src_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalities.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsibogela makoa a nopotsweng ke dinaga tsa balekane mo Letsholong la Setlhopha sa Ditiro tsa go Tsaya Dikgato mo Mererong ya Ditšhelete (FATF).

src_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectively.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno dirile ditshitshinyo di le 40 tse di tla thusang go dira gore Aforika Borwa tsamaisane le dikgato tsa boditšhabatšhaba tsa go lwantshana le go tlhatswiwa ga tšhelete le go tlamela ka ditšhelete mekgatlo ya menolopuso..   Go fitlhetswe gore Aforika Borwa na le makoa mo dikarolong di le.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultation..  Financial Matters Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono samagana le dikarolo di ka nna 14 tsa tse di nopotsweng.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa sa le ntse le tokololo ya FATF fa sale ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).
The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamente go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.. Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi, wa ngwaga wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) dira gore go tlhagisa le go tlamela ka sere sepe se se akareditsweng ka fa tlase ga Šejule 1 le Šejule 2 ya Molao ono go tsewe le tlolo ya molao..   Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di samagana le Karolo ya bo 63 go fitlhetsweng gore ga tsamaisane le molaotheo malebana le gore Tona neelwa dithata tsa go baakanya dišejule kwa ntle le go di fetisa mo matlhong batlhankedi ba setheo sa peomolao.

src_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.
tgt_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2020, Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo rebotse katlholo ya gore Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa 1992 ga tsamaisane le molaotheo mme ne ya beela thoko go tsenngwa tirisong ga katlholo eno go fitlha ka la bo 17 Sedimonthole 2022 go naya Palamente nako gore baakanye phoso eno   Tiragalo e Tlang.

src_text: The Bill was published for public comment in February.
tgt_text: Kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.
Aforika Borwa tla amogela kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 kwa Motse Kapa magareng ga la bo 9 le la bo 11 Lwetse.

src_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Ke la ntlha metshameko eno tshwarelwa mo kontinenteng ya Aforika mme go tla bo go na le ditlhopha di le 24 tsa banna le di le 16 tsa basadi go tswa lefatsheng ka bophara tse di tla bong di gaisana     Melaetsa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Go Akgola          Kabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ntlha ya go dira hisetori mo Aforika Borwa le go gapa sekgele sa ntlha sa kgaisano ya Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), kwa makgaolakgannyeng WAFCON ngwaga wa 2022 a neng tshwaretswe kwa Rabat, kwa Morocco ka Lamatlhatso, la bo 23 Phukwi.

src_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).
tgt_text: Go ntse go le jalo, ba nnile le tshiamelo ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa basadi sa FIFA se se yang go amogelwa ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la bo 20 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 20 Phatwe.

src_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).
tgt_text: ●  Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa (Team South Africa), ka ntlha ya go gapa dimedale di le 27 mo maphateng a farologaneng kwa Metshamekong ya Commonwealth ya 2022 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Birmingham, Engelane go tloga ka la bo 28 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 8 Phatwe.

src_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.
tgt_text: Se feletse kwa maemong borobongwe ka dimedale tsa gauta di le supa, tsa selefera di le robongwe le tsa boronse di le.

src_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.
tgt_text: ●  Basadi ba Springbok, ka phenyo ya bona kgatlhanong le Spain mo metshamekong mebedi ya ntlha ya Motseletsele wa Mariga wa Basadi kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Emirates Airline Park kwa Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), go rwesiwa korone ya Mmabontle wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa yo montšhwa wa ngwaga wa.

src_text: South Africa has been member of FATF since.
tgt_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka go gapa 2022 AIG Women’s Open mme nna mosadi wa boraro wa Aforika Borwa go gapa bosimega jwa gauta.

src_text: Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.
tgt_text: Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Dipatlisiso le Taolo ya Dipholisi kwa Lefapheng la Ditiro tsa Puso le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba (DPWI)..   Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jaaka DDG: Tikwatikwe ya Tsamaiso ya Matlhothapelo Setšhaba kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo..   Rre Adam Mthombeni jaaka DDG: Tirisanommogo mo Ditheong tsa Puso  kwa DPWI.

src_text: The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..

The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.

src_text: In 2020, the Constitutional Court declared Section 63 of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act of 1992 unconstitutional and suspended the invalidity to 17 December 2022 to provide for Parliament to correct the defect  Upcoming Event.
tgt_text: Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jaaka Motlhankedikhuduthamaga wa Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tlhabololo ya Motlakase.

tgt_text: Ditokololo tse di dirang nako e sa tlalang tsa Bothati jwa Motlakase wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa   Rre Thembani Bukula (Modulasetilo)   Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsamodulasetilo)   Mme Precious Sibiya   Mme Thembeka Semane; lee.

src_text: The showcase event is held for the first time on the African continent and will see 24 men’s and 16 women’s teams from across the world competing  Messages.
tgt_text: Modulasetilo le tokololo ya Boto ya Lekgotla la Thekenoloji ya Diminerale   Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetilo); leb.

src_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: Banyana Banyana, for making history and winning South Africa’s first ever Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), at the 2022 WAFCON finals held in Rabat, Morocco on Saturday, 23 July.
