src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke go fokotsega ka palo nnye ga dipalopalo tsa botlhokatiro ka fa nageng, jaaka di fokotsegile ka.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the slight decline in the country’s unemployment rate, which dropped by.
tgt_text: 6%, go tloga mo go.

src_text: 6 percent, from.
tgt_text: 5% mo kotareng ya ntlha go fitlha mo go.

src_text: 5% in the first quarter to.
tgt_text: 9% mo kotareng ya bobedi mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: 9 percent in the second quarter of.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tse di phasaladitsweng mo Dipatlisisong tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS) tse di phasaladitsweng ke ba Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) di bontsha gore ditiro tse dintsi di nnile teng mo Matsholong Ditirelo tsa Baagi (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 276 000), mo Lephateng la Matlole (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 169 000), le mo Dikonterakeng (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 104 000).

src_text: The figures published in the Quarterly Labour Force Survey by Statistics South Africa show that the biggest job gains were recorded in Community and Social Services (276 000), Trade (169 000), Finance (128 000) and Construction (104 000)..
tgt_text: Palo ya batho botlhe ba ba nang le ditiro ne tsamaya mo go dimilione di le 15, 6 mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022, mme fa palo eno bapisiwa le mo kotareng e fetileng go bonagala gore palo ya batho ba ba senang ditiro mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022 oketsegile ka 132 000 mme batho ba ba senang ditiro ke ba le kanaka dimilione di le robedi.

src_text: The total number of employed persons stood at 15, 6 million in the second quarter of 2022, and the number of unemployed persons increased by 132 000 to 8, 0 million in the second quarter of 2022 compared to the previous quarter.
tgt_text: Phokotsego e potlana eno ya botlhokatiro ke selo se segolo se se bontshang gore maiteko puso le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago go godisa ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro tse di tlhokegang simolotse go re tswela mosola.

src_text: These modest yet impressive gains show that the concerted efforts by government and its social partners to grow the economy and create much-needed jobs are beginning to bear fruit..
tgt_text: Seno ke bopaki jwa gore fa re dika tiro mmogo ka go dirisa bokgoni jwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe, re ka kgona go fedisa dikgwetlho tse ikonomi ya rona tobaneng le tsona.

src_text: This is testament to the fact that if we all work together by harnessing our collective strengths, we can overcome the challenges facing our economy..
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya maAforika Borwa jaaka go le boima mo matshelong bona ka ntlha ya dilo tse di bitsang ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo mmogo le dipalo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of South Africans as they struggle to go about their daily lives owing to the cost of living and high unemployment rate.
tgt_text: Re le mmuso o tlhokomelang baagi ba yona, re santse re eme ka le le reng re tla tshwarisana tiro le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya go tlhokomela baagi gore motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe isago ya gagwe nne botoka.

src_text: As caring government, we remain determined and committed to working together with our social partners to build better tomorrow for everyone.
tgt_text: Puso santse eme ka la gore tla rekela dikgwebo tsa ka fa nageng ka go reka didirisiwa le ditirelo mo dikgwebong tsa ka fa nageng ya rona.

src_text: Government remains committed to supporting local businesses by buying local goods and services.
tgt_text: Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba.

src_text: Public infrastructure.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale baagi ba kwa Tongaat kwa KwaZulu-Natal ka go senya mafaratlhatlha tikologo eo fa ba ne ba rebotse megwanto ya go lwela metsi.

src_text: Cabinet condemned the destruction of infrastructure by Tongaat residents in KwaZulu-Natal during protest over access to water.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse gore baagi ba theose matshwafo le go nna le pelotelele jaaka ba Setheo sa Ditiro tsa go Tlhatswa Metsi sa Tongaat ba samagane le ditiro tsa go busetsa baagi metsi.

src_text: Cabinet called for calm and patience as work is underway to restore the Tongaat Water Treatment Works.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya baagi ba ba ntseng ba gelela metsi mo diterokong tse di ba tlisetsang metsi mo metseng fa sale merwalela e gogotseng lefelo leno kwa tshimologong ya monongwaga.
Le fa go le jalo, tirisodikgoka le go melelana meno ga di kitla di tlisa tharabololo bile gape go senya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba ke go itshenyetsa.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of residents who have had to use water tankers for an extended period since the flooding earlier this year.
tgt_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: However, violence and anarchy are not solution, and the destruction of public infrastructure only hurts local communities.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go saeniwa ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ga Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa 2022 (Molao wa bo 3 wa 2022) gore nne molao.

src_text: Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act of.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo molao ono ke go tlhabolola dithata le maemo maitshwaro dipusoselegae.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the signed into law the Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act, 2022 (Act 3 of 2022) by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Molao ono ke karolo ya dikgato tse di tsewang ke puso tsa go dira gore ditirelo tsa puso nne tse di manontlhotlho le go dira bonnete jwa gore batho ba tlamelwa ka ditirelo tse di sa kgaotseng, fela jaaka go tlhalositswe mo ditshwanelong tse di botlhokwa tse di umakilweng mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa..  Molao ono totobatsa dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go latelwa go thapa batlhankedi ba bagolwane mo pusong.

src_text: The Act aims to improve the capacity and ethical standards of local government.
tgt_text: Jaanong molao ono ganetsa batlhankedi ba ba golwane mo pusong go ka tshwara ditiro tse dingwe tsa sepolotiki mo mekgatlhong ya dipolotiki.

src_text: The law forms part of government’s efforts to professionalise the Public Service and ensure the sustainable provision of services to the people, as basic right enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of..
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape ka molao ono ke gore re diphatlhatiro tsa batsamaisi ba dimasepala tse di iseng di thapelwe batlhankedi mo go tsona di tshwanetse go phasaladiwa naga ka bophara gore botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi ba tsenye dikopo tsa go neelwa ditiro tseo.

src_text: The Act specifies the processes to be followed for senior position appointments.
tgt_text: Kabinete na le tshepo e tletseng ya gore dikarolo tseno tse di fetotsweng di tla dira bonnete jwa gore batho bao ba thapilweng kgotsa bao ba tlhophilweng mo maemong bona ba tla kgona go dira seo ba se thapetsweng go ya ka seo ba se solofeditseng gore re kgone go dira gore botshelo bo nne botoka mo bathong botlhe.

src_text: It now prevents senior public officials from holding political office in political parties.
tgt_text: Bosenyi.

src_text: Also with this Act in place, vacant municipal manager posts are expected to be advertised nationally to attract wide pool of suitable candidates..
tgt_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe batlhankedi ba tlhatlhobo ya dithoto kwa melelwaneng ba Setheo sa Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS) jaaka kwa Boemelafofaneng ba OR Tambo ka Latshipi wa la bo 28 Phatwe 2022 ba tshwere dithoto tse di neng di tlisiwa kwano tsa boima jwa dikilokerema di le 785 tsa diokobatsi tsa crystal meth tse boleng jwa tsona bo ka dirang R236 milione fa di rekisiwa mo mebileng.

src_text: Cabinet is confident that these changes will ensure that those who are appointed or elected into these positions will be able to deliver on their promises so that we can achieve better life for all.
tgt_text: Go tshwariwa ga diokobatsi tseno go tla romela ditlhokotsebe tsa digongwana tsa diokobatsi molaetsa o totobetseng wa gore melelwane ya rona tlhokometswe ka botlalo bile batlhankedi ba naga ya rona ba dira ka natla go fedisa botlhokotsebe  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Crime.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Lekgotla le le Samaganang le Merero ya Setheo sa Thuto Kgolwane ka ga Dipatlisiso tsa Megolo ya Batlatsabakhanselara le ya Batlhankedi ba Bagolo mo Ditheong tsa Aforika Borwa tsa Thuto Kgolwane.

src_text: Cabinet commended the South African Revenue Service’s customs officials for seizing 785 kg of crystal meth with street value of R236 million at the OR Tambo International Airport on Sunday, 28 August.
tgt_text: Kabinete tsopoletswe ka seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dipatlisisong tsa CHE tse mo ngwageng wa 2020 Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi, Ngaka Blade Nzimande laetseng gore di diriwe, gore go sekasekiwe megolo le go thapiwa ga khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti mo sebakeng se se fetileng sa dingwaga di le 15, go simolola ka ngwaga wa 2005 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa..  Maitlhomo dipatlisiso tseno ke go tlhatlhoba gore diyunibesiti kgotsa ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane tsa ka fa nageng ya rona ke eng se se di dirang gore di kgone go itshomarela, di kgone go dira tiro ya tsona le gore di kgone go itlhabolola.

src_text: The drug bust will send clear warning to criminal syndicates that our ports of entry and exit are well protected and our officers are working hard to stamp out any criminality   Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno nopotse dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di utulotseng mmogo le go dira ditshwaelo tsa gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go okobatsa maemo.

src_text: Report of the Council on Higher Education (CHE) Enquiry into the Remuneration of University Vice Chancellors and Senior Executive Managers in South Africa.
tgt_text: Gare ga tse dingwe tse dintsi, ditshwaelo tse di tshwaetsweng di tshitshinya gore megolo ya batlhankedi tshwanetse go tlhoka lehunelo.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed on the outcomes of the CHE enquiry that was commissioned in 2020 by the Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation, Dr Blade Nzimande, to examine the remuneration levels and trends of the university executives over the 15-year period from 2005 to..
tgt_text: Go tshwanetswe go tlhomiwe setheo se se ikemetseng se se sa direleng lephata leno gore nne sona se se rwalang maikarabelo go tsaya ditshweetso tse di tsamaisanang le megolo tshitshinya gape le gore dithulaganyo tsa go tlhatlhoba fa batlhankedi ba dira tiro ka botswapelo di tshwanetse go gagamadiwa mo ditheong tseno.

src_text: The investigation was to establish the sustainability, viability and development of the universities or higher education sector in the country.
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tseno tse di dirilweng di lebeletse gape le bogolo jo bo farologaneng jwa ditheo tseno mmogo le go tlhoma boleng jwa maemo a tsamaisanang le ditheo tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: This report outlines the key findings together with proposed remedial recommendations..
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi tla atlhaatlha pegelo eno le khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti maitlhomo le go gagamatsa ditheo tseno tsa thuto tla re morago ga foo, pegelo eno ya phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso: mo go www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: The recommendations propose, amongst others strengthened and more transparent remuneration process.
tgt_text: Go Fetola Batsholateu mo Batlhankeding ba Lephata la Thuto le Dipatlisiso mo Lekaleng la Thuto Kgolwane.

src_text: The setting up of an external and independent oversight structure to oversee the decision-making process of remunerations.
tgt_text: Kabinete eme nokeng ditshitshinyo tsa dipatlisiso ka bobedi tse di dirilweng ka maitlhomo go re tlhaba botlhale ka dikgato tse re tshwanetseng go di tsaya go oketsa lebelo la go fetola batsholateu mo batlhankeding ba lephata la thuto le dipatlisiso mo lekaleng la thuto kgolwane.

src_text: It also proposes the strengthening of the performance evaluation systems in the institutions.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya ntlha ke e dirilweng ke Setlhophatiro sa Ditona seo se dirileng dipatlisiso mabapi le gore go gana kae gore go thapiwe, go somarelwe le gore go godisiwe batlhankedi ba thuto kgolwane ba bathobantsho ba leng maAforika Borwa.

src_text: The study has also taken into account the various sizes of these institutions and it also did international benchmarking.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya bobedi ke e dirilweng ke Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi mmogo le Setheo sa Dipatlisiso sa Naga – mo ba dirileng dipatlisiso tseno le Diyunibesiti tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng lekoko la diyunibesiti tsa puso di le 26 tsa naga.

src_text: The Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation is expected to discuss this report with the university leadership as measure to strengthen these academic institutions.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno ka bobedi di tshitshinya gore go nne le maano go samagana le morero wa go fetola batsholateu mo dikarolong di le tlhano tse dikgolo leng karolo e mabapi le go tlhagisa batlhankedi ba maemo thuto ya morago ga go konosetsa dithuto tsa ntlha tse dikgolwane; karolo ya bobedi ke ya go nna le seabe ga badiredi ba setheo; karolo ya boraro ke ya setlwaedi sa go dira dilo mo setheong sa thuto se se amegang le ka fao se dirang tiro ka gone; karolo ya bone ke ya mabapi le dipholisi le maano mmogo le karolo ya botlhano e leng ka ga go samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhaela ga didirisiwa.

src_text: The report will thereafter be published in the Department of Higher Education and Training’s website: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Tumelano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba Mabapi le Didirisiwa tsa Tshimologo ya Dijalo go Thusa mo Mererong ya Dijo le ya Temo.

src_text: Accelerated Transformation of the Research and Teaching Capacity in the Higher Education Sector.
tgt_text: Kabinete isitse tumelano eno kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.

src_text: Cabinet supported the recommendations of the two studies that were commissioned to advise on the measures to be put in place so as to accelerate the transformation of research and teaching capacity in the institutions of higher learning.
tgt_text: Seno se tla dira gore Aforika Borwa nne nngwe ya dinaga tse di dumelaneng ka tumelano eno e kaelang dinaga tse leng karolo ya tumelano eno go somarela le go tlhokomela didirisiwa tsa tshimologo ya dijalo go thusa mo mererong ya dijo le ya temothuo.

src_text: The first report was done by the Ministerial Task Team which investigated the blockages that prevent the recruitment, retention and progression of black South African academics.
tgt_text: Ka go ikobela tumelano eno, seo se tla thusa go gagamatsa maikemisetso naga eno ago somarela le go tlhokomela ka fao didirisiwa tsa go simolola dijalo diriwang ka teng, mmogo le go ema nokeng baagi ba kwa metseselegaeng.

src_text: The second report – commissioned by the Department of Science and Innovation and the National Research Foundation – was done by Universities South Africa, the umbrella body representative of the 26 public universities in the country.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.

src_text: Both these reports proposes intervention strategies to accelerate transformation in five broad areas, namely in postgraduate pineline; staff participation; institutional culture and practice; policy and the strategy, and limited resources.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.

Leano leno le na le ponelopele botlhe ba nang le yona e ka ga go nna le Aforika Borwa yo botlhe ba lekalekanang mo go yona gape sa kgotlheleng tikologo tlhalosa ditheo le dipholisi tseo di tla re thusang gore re kgone go diragatsa seo.

src_text: International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (the Treaty).
tgt_text: Leano leno le tla ama motho mang le mang yo leng ka fa gare ga naga ya Aforika Borwa bile tla re naya tšhono ya gore re kgone go baakanya lefa leo puso ya tlhaolele re sietseng lona leng la go dira gore batho ba se lekalekane mme re dire gore re nna le ikonomi botlhe mo go yona ba unngwelwang.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Treaty to Parliament for accession.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Moporesitente e Samaganang le Merero ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi dirile dikgato di le dintsi tsa go batlana le maikutlo badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago mme bontsi jwa bona bo ne ba ema nokeng leano leno.

src_text: This will enable South Africa to form part of the parties to this Treaty, which guides the member countries in conserving and ensuring the sustainable usage of the plant genetic resources for food and agriculture.
tgt_text: Kabinete totobaditse gore kgato ya go fetola maemo go dira gore re ngwaga wa 2050 goroga fitlhele re se tlhole re dirisa dilwana tse di kueletsang mesi tshwanetse go tsamaelana le dilo tse re fisegelang go di bona mo tlhabololong ya naga, mme di tsenyeletsa le tsa go tlhola ditiro tse di nang le seriti mo bathong botlhe, go thusa baagi le go fedisa tshokolo.

src_text: Acceding to this Treaty will also strengthen the country’s commitment towards conservation and sustainable use of plant genetic resources, and provide support to rural communities.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go badirisanimmogo botlhe mo mererong ya loago go ema nokeng leano leno la go tsamaisa tiro.

src_text: Just Transition Framework for South Africa.
tgt_text: Leano le le tseneletseng la go tsamaisa tiro le tla tle le kwalwa, mme le tla golaganngwa le maano puso mmogo le go golaganngwa gape le thulaganyetso ya go dirisa matlole.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Just Transition Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Karata Ntšhwa ya Laesense ya go Kganna ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: The framework presents shared vision for an equitable, climate-resilient South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Kganna e ntseng dirisiwa tseelwe legato ke karata eo nang le dintlha di le dintsinyana tse di ka ga go thibela tirisobotlhaswa ya yona.

src_text: It defines the principles and policy areas to achieve this.
tgt_text: Karata e dirisiwang ga jaanong simolotse go dirisiwa bogolotala go simolola ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: The transition framework will impact everyone in South Africa, and provides an opportunity to address historical inequities and creates an economy that benefits all.
tgt_text: Diphetogo mo thekenolojing di ntse di nna teng mme jaanong re setse re dirisa madi a boitshegang gore re kgone go tlhokomela dikarata tseno.

src_text: The Presidential Climate Commission conducted an extensive consultation process with social partners and received broad support for the framework.
tgt_text: Karata ga jaana tshitshintsweng tla dira gore dilaesense tsa go kganna tsa naga eno di tsamaisane le Dilaesense tsa go Kganna tse di Dirisiwang ke Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba ka Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso ya Dintlha tsa Boitshupo (ISO18013).

src_text: Cabinet affirmed that the shift to net-zero carbon economy by 2050 must support national development aspirations, including decent work for all, social inclusion and the eradication of poverty.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya Letsholo la Ditiro tsa Sešhaba mo Metseng (EPWP).

src_text: Cabinet has called on all social partners to rally behind and embrace this framework detailed implementation plan for the framework will be developed, and it will be integrated into the government planning and budgeting system.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi ya EPWP ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: New South African Driving Licence Card.
tgt_text: EPWP ke le lengwe la matsholo a botlhokwa puso maitlhomo lona leng go fedisa tshokolo le go neela baagi megolo ya tiro ba dirileng mo metseng ka go ba naya ditiro tsa nakwana, segolobogolo ka go naya bašwa le basadi ditiro.

src_text: Cabinet approved the replacement of the current Driving Licence Card to one with more secure design features..
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se sentšhwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi se tla matlafatsa letsholo leno mmogo le go abelana ka tshedimosetso e tlhamaletseng e ka ga megolo, dithulaganyo tse di tla diriwang go kopa thuso ya matlole mmogo le go thusa baagi, mmogo le go dira gore EPWP tsamaisane le dithulaganyo tse di leng teng tsa matsatsi ano tsa go tlhokomela badiri.

src_text: The current system has been in operation since.
tgt_text: Se tla dira gore tirisanommogo magareng ga makala puso le makala poraefete gagamale go dira gore EPWP nne le mosola mogolo thata mo go direng gore tlhole ditiro tse di seriti le mo go fediseng tshokolo.

src_text: The technology has since evolved and it is becoming expensive to maintain the current infrastructure.
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape se pholisi eno tla se dirang ke go rotloetsa gore matsholo go direla setšhaba se latele thulaganyo le nngwe e tshwanang gotlhe mo nageng mme kgone go nna le boitshimololedi.

src_text: The new proposed card will make the country’s driving licence compatible with the International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).
tgt_text: Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Expanded Public Works Programme (EPWP) Policy.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula bogolo jwa mobentlo montšhwa le dikarolo tse dintšhwa tse di tla tsenngwang mo mading tshipi ngwaga wa 2023 mabapi le Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the draft EPWP Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le gore ngwaga yo mongwe le yo mongwe dipuo tse di dirisitsweng mo mading a tla dirisiwang tshipi di tshwanetse go fetolwa gore di neelane tšhono.

src_text: The EPWP is one of government's key programmes aimed at providing poverty and income relief by creating temporary work opportunities, particularly for youth and women..
tgt_text: Lefoko "Aforika Borwa" le tla tsenngwa fela mo letlhakoreng le le lengwe la madi ano tshipi mme le tla kwadiwa ka dipuo tsotlhe tsa naga eno.

src_text: The draft new policy will strengthen the programme and provide clarity on aspects such as wages, funding model and social protection, and also align the EPWP with modern labour practices.
tgt_text: Mo mading tshipi R5 go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le tharo; mo mading tshipi R2 50c 20c le 10c go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le pedi mme mo mading tshipi R1 go tla dirisiwa puo le nngwe.

src_text: It will promote partnerships between government and the private sector toward ensuring the EPWP contributes massively towards the creation of decent work and alleviation of poverty.
tgt_text: Dipuo tsotlhe tseno di tla neelana tšhono ngwaga mongwe le mongwe sebaka sa dingwaga tse di tlang di le.

src_text: The policy will also promote innovation in the implementation of public works programmes across the country..
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe se se ka ga Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 ya go Golaganya Ditirelo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Boleng jwa Metsi (IWQM).

src_text: Amendments to the Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa mo kuranteng ya puso Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya IWQM ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the dimension, design and compilation of the year 2023 Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno e tshitshintsweng tla tsena mo legatong la Pholisi e feletsweng ke nako ya WQM ya ngwaga wa 1991 mmogo le mo legatong la maano yona a neng tsenngwa tirisong ka ngwaga wa..  Pholisi eno tlhagisa dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tse tla nnang tsona tse tlhokomelo ya boleng jwa metsi tla ikakatlelang ka tsona rulaganya ka tolamo melao yotlhe e tsamaisanang le merero ya metsi mmogo le maikano naga eno mo maitlhomong yona go obamela dithulaganyo tsa go somarela metsi jaaka le sedirisiwa se se tlhokagalang.

src_text: It approved the annual rotational system of the usage of the official languages on the fourth decimal coin series.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang.

src_text: The word “South Africa” will be inserted on the one side of the coins and printed in all the official languages.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: Three languages will be used in the R5 coin; two languages R2; 50c, 20c and 10c coins and the R1 will be in one language.
tgt_text: Makhubu ano ke mangwe metswedi ya tlhago mannye re nang le ona a leng botlhokwa thata mo go godiseng ikonomi ya Aforika Borwa mo mererong ya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba setegeniki le ditlhaeletsano.

src_text: All these languages will be used on an annual rotational basis over the next 10 years.
tgt_text: Pholisi e tshitshinngwang eno maitlhomo yona ke go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go abelana ka dilaesense tsa go disa marang kgaso mmogo le tsa megala; tsa go gasa dikanale; tsa go gasa marang ditlhaeletsano tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa go dira dipatlisiso le tlhabologo; tsa go dirisiwa ke baagi le tsa diintaseteri tsa mothale oo.

src_text: Draft Integrated Water Quality Management (IWQM) Policy of.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo mangwe pholisi eno ke go tlhotlheletsa tekatekano le go abelana marang ano ka go lekalekana gore mo lekaleng leno go nne le  phetogo ya batsholateu le go dira gore kgokaganyo ya marang setegeniki kgonege gore tshware le ko mafelong a kgakalakgakala le mafelo a tlhabologileng ka fa nageng ya rona.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the Draft IWQM Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Bathankedi ba Aforika Borwa ba ba Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso.

src_text: The proposed policy will replace the outdated WQM Policy of 1991 and its strategy that was put in place in.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula leina la Rre Mandla Samuel Mchunu go nna mothankedi wa Aforika Borwa yo Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso (Kgaolo ya .
Rre Mchunu ga jaanong dira jaaka tokololo mo botong eo.

src_text: The policy outlines set of principles that will form the basis for water quality management.
tgt_text: Go tshitshinngwa gore tlhophiwe lekgetlo le lengwe gape mo Lekgotleng leno la ITU mo pakeng ya 2023 go fitlha mo pakeng ya..  Ditlhopho tseno di tla tshwarwa ka nako go tla bong go tshwerwe Khonferense ya Togomaano ya ITU e tla tshwarelwang kwa Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la bo 26 Lwetse go fitlha ka la bo 14 Diphalane.

src_text: It provides an alignment to all the relevant water-related legislation and the country’s global commitments to the provision and conservation of water as scarce resource.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa santse eme ka maikemisetso yona go tshegetsa maitlhomo ITU go tswalela sekgala mo didirisiweng tsa setegeniki ka go dira gore lefatshe lotlhe le gokelelwe mafaratlhatlha ano  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy for public comment.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Lwetse tla ketikiwa ka morero yo reng : "Re bontsha Lefa la Solomon Linda mmogo le Mmino wa Setso wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa Tlotlo”.

src_text: Radio frequency spectrum is finite natural resource that is vital to the growth of South Africa’s digital economy and communication infrastructure.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go keteka Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa ka mokgwa wa go keteka ditso tsa rona tse di humileng tse di nang le maatla go dira gore re nne seoposengwe.

src_text: The proposed policy intends to support the spectrum allocation and licensing for fixed mobile; broadcasting; aeronautical and marine; research and development; community access, and other relevant industries.
tgt_text: Rotlhe re tshwanetse go tsaya matsapa gore re dirisane mmogo mo go fediseng ditiragalo tsa go re dira gore re se nne bana ba thari le nngwe mmogo le tsa go se tshware batho ka go tshwana tse re tswang ka tsona kwa loe mme re rotloetse maitsholo go ipela ga go nna maAforika Borwa a motlotlo  Melaetsa.

src_text: The policy also seeks to promote equity and fair allocation to contribute towards the transformation of the sector and accessibility of digital connectivity even in outlying parts of the country.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go:Batho botlhe ba ba fentseng, ba ba ikgapetseng dimetale le bao ba neng ba gaisana le ba bangwe mo Lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades Marathon, leo le itsegeng ka la gore ke "Lebelo le le Gaisang Otlhe a Tshamekiwang ke Batho", leo le neng le tabogiwa ka Latshipi 28 Phatwe.

src_text: South Africa’s Candidature for the International Telecommunication Union ( ITU) Council and Radio Regulations Board.
tgt_text: Mofenyi mo lebelong la banna ke Tete Dijana (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 5, metsotso le 30 le metsotswana le 38) yo nnang kwa Mahikeng kwa porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima mme mo lebelong la bomme mofenyi ke Alexandra Morozova (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 6, metsotso le 17 le metsotswana le 47).

src_text: Cabinet approved South Africa’s candidature of Mr Mandla Samuel Mchunu to the ITU Radio Regulations Board (Region .
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 88), yo neng le Segatlhamelamasisis mo mererong ya kgaratlhelo ya tokologo yo gape neng le mogale mo mokgatlhong wa badiri yo gape neilweng tlotla ka go abelwa Kabo ya Tlotlo ya Luthuli mo ngwageng wa 2004 “go tlotla seabe sa gagwe sa go lwela ditshwanelo tsa badiri botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe mmogo le go lwela gore re feletse re na le Aforika Borwa yo sa tlhaoleng ba bangwe go ya ka morafe wa bona, go ya ka bong jwa bona, yo nang le tokologo le temokerasi”.Mapodisi le tlhano Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) ao neng le ka fa teng ga sefofane sa SAPS fa se ne se sugagana kwa Boemelafofaneng jwa Rand, kwa Germiston ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Phatwe.

src_text: Mr Mchunu is currently serving board member.
tgt_text: Mapodisi batlisisa gore ke eng se se tlhodileng kotsi eno.

src_text: He is proposed for re-election to the ITU Council for the term 2023 to.
tgt_text: Kabinete beile mo dithapelong tsa pholo ya ka bonako motlhankedi yo leng mo dikgobalong tse di masisi yo neng fofisa sefofane seno  Go Thapiwa.

Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo Lephateng la go Disa Lekala la Puso le go Tlhatlhelela Badiredi mo Lefapheng la Tiromaano,Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro  Mme Kwena Komape thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la go Godisa Ikonomi, Kgwebisano le Tlotlomatso ya Serodumo mo Lefapheng la Temothuo, Pusetso ya Dinaga le Tlhabololo ya Metsemagae  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la Tikwatikwe ya Ditirelo tsa Botsamaisi jwa Ditiragalo tsa Matlhotlhapelo mo Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo.

src_text: Issues in the Environment.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: Kabinete begetswe ke Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba Pravin Gordhan malebana le bokgoni jwa Eskom go fokotsa go timiwa ga motlakase kgapetsakgapetsa mme gape ya amogela pegelo ya tiro e setseng dirilwe go tswa kwa Komiting ya Setegeniki ya Komiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Mathata Motlakase.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed by Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan on the capacity of Eskom to mitigate the intermittent load-shedding and also received progress report from the Technical Committee of the National Energy Crisis Committee.
tgt_text: Go tla dirwa dikitsiso tse dingwe go latela go konosediwa ga dipuisano tse di tseneletseng malebana le dipegelo tseno.

Kabinete tlhagisitse go swaba ga yona ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsego tse di bakwang ke go timiwa ga motlakase mo dikgwebong le mo matlong, bogolo segolo jaaka seno se diragala ka nako puso samaganeng le ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phukwi.

src_text: Further announcements will be made following the conclusion of the intensive deliberations of these reports.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso.

src_text: Cabinet expressed regret at the disruption and inconvenience caused by load-shedding to businesses and households, particularly happening at the time when government is engaged with the interventions announced by the President in July.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tlhomiwa ga Setsha se sentšhwa sa Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing kwa Kempton Park, se leng karolo ya peeletso e solofeditsweng kwa Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeeletso ya Aforika Borwa (SAIC) e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sandton Convention Centre kwa Johannesburg ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe..  Tlamelo eno ntšhwa ya disekweremetara di le 62 000 kopanya ditiro tse di neng di dirwa kwa ditsheng tse tlhano tse di farologaneng mme na le badiri ba ka nna.

Ke nngwe ya ditlamelo tsa Sandvik tse dikgolokgolo le tse di tsweletseng pele go gaisa mo lefatsheng, mme na le bokgoni jwa go tlhagisa dilaisi tsa ka fa tlase ga lefatshe ka dimatheriale tse di fetang 60% tsa Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Investment.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gape le leeto la Moporesidente Ramaphosa la go lekola maemo la kwa KwaZulu-Natala ka nako ya go tlhomiwa lefelo la tlhagiso ya dithoto la Hesto Harnesses kwa Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la bo 13 Lwetse.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the new Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site in Kempton Park, which was part of the R350-million investment pledged at the fourth South Africa Investment Conference (SAIC) held at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesburg on 24 March..
tgt_text: Lefelo leno ke le lengwe la diporojeke di le tlhano tse go dirilweng dipeeletso mo go tsona tse leng karolo ya maitlamo setlamo sa Metair Investments Limited go beeletsa  4 bilione go tshegetsa go atolosiwa le go fetolelwa ga Ford Ranger ntšhwa go nna ya ka fa nageng.

src_text: The new 62 000 square-metre facility consolidates operations previously undertaken at five separate sites and accommodates about 550 employees.
tgt_text: Gape Moporesidente tsenetse pulo ya porojeke ya ntšhwafatso le katoloso ya setlamo sa Sappi Saiccor Mill ya boleng jwa R7,7 bilione kwa Umkomaas maikaelelo yona leng go oketsa bokgoni jwa setlamo le bokgoni jwa sona jwa go gaisana lefatshe ka bophara fa se ntse se tlhama ditšhono tsa tiro tsa pakakhutshwane le tsa pakatelele.

src_text: It is one of Sandvik’s biggest and most advanced facilities globally, and has the ability to produce underground loaders with over 60% South African content..
tgt_text: Dipeeletso tseno ke karolo ya ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng ke beng ba diintaseteri kwa SAIC.

src_text: Cabinet further welcomed the oversight visit by President Ramaphosa in KwaZulu-Natal during the launch of the Hesto Harnesses manufacturing facility in Stanger, KwaDukuza on 13 September.
tgt_text: Peeletso nngwe le nngwe ntšhwa mo nageng ya rona thusa mo go ageng sešwa le go busetsa sekeng ikonomi ya rona, mme tswelela go dira gore Aforika Borwa nne lefelo leo leng mmamoratwa fa go tla mo go direng dipeeletso mo go lona.

src_text: This facility is one of five capital investment projects that form part of R. 4-billion commitment by Metair Investments Limited to support the expansion and localisation of the new Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: Tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha.

src_text: The President also attended the opening of the Sappi Saiccor Mill upgrade and expansion project worth R7,7 billion in Umkomaas, which is aimed at increasing the capacity and global competitiveness of the company while also creating short- and long-term employment opportunities..
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go bulwa ga karolo ntšhwa ya Tsela ya Musina Ring kwa Limpopo e tla dirang gore go nne bonolo gore batho ba tsamae kwa Musina, mme gape letla gore go nne le tiragatso ya kgwebisano le ikonomi magareng ga Aforika Borwa le Dinaga tsa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika.

src_text: These investments form part of pledges made by industrialists at the SAIC.
tgt_text: Porojeke e jeleng R640 milione tlhametse batho ba kgaolo eo ditiro tsa nako e tletseng di feta 275 mme ya tlamela baagi ba kgaolo eo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME) ka ditšhono.

src_text: Every new investment into our country assists in the reconstruction and recovery of our economy, and continues to profile South Africa as an investment destination of choice.
tgt_text: Kago ya Tsela ya Musina Ring ke karolo ya lenaneo la puso la dikago, leo le tseelang tlhogong maitlhomo ERRP, le maikaelelo lona leng go tlhama ditšhono tse botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go tsona le ditiro mo maphateng a farologaneng le mo metseng.

src_text: Infrastructure development.
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo Jagersfontein.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the new section of the Musina Ring Road in Limpopo that will make it easier for people to move around Musina, and also allow for increased trade and economic activity between South Africa and the Southern African Development Community countries.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso a tswang kwa botennye jwa dipelo kwa malapeng ba ba latlhegetsweng ke matshelo morago ga go thubega ga lebota la moepo o phuagantsweng wa kgaolo eno kwa Jagersfontein, kwa Foreisetata mme ga dutla kgosomano ya seretse se se bakileng matlhotlhapelo ka mahube naka tsa kgomo ka Sontaga, 11 Lwetse.

src_text: The R640-million project created over 275 full-time jobs for locals and provided opportunities for local communities and small, medium and micro enterprises (SMMEs)..
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo ano sentse gape dikago tsa motse oo, dithoto tsa tsa batho di tshwana le dikoloi le dintlo di le mmalwa.

src_text: The construction of the Musina Ring Road is part of government’s infrastructure programme, through the ERRP, that seeks to create inclusive growth and employment opportunities across various sectors and communities.
tgt_text: Ka nako ya fa ne etetse koo ka Mosupologo, 12 Lwetse 2022, Moporesidente Ramaphosa lebogile maiteko go busetsa maemo sekeng a dirwang mo lefelong leo ne solofetsa gape gore puso tla ema nokeng baagi ba ba amegileng ba Jagersfontein ka tshegetso e tlhokegang.

src_text: Jagersfontein disaster.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogela gore beng ba moepo ba rile ba ikemiseditse go tlamela puso ka thuso ya setegeniki le tshegetso fa ka kopiwa ke Lekgotla la Diminerale la Aforika Borwa.

src_text: 1 Cabinet expressed its sincere condolences to the families of those who lost their lives after the tailings of an abandoned local mine in Jagersfontein in the Free State burst open and released disastrous mudslide around dawn on Sunday, 11 September.
tgt_text: Intaseteri ya meepo tswelela go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa mo ikonoming jaaka tlhagisa ditiro ka go thapa batho abo tsona le ka go thapa ditlamo tse tsona tla nnang tsona tse di thapang batho, ka go duelela letseno la go romela ditlhagisiwa tsa ka kwano kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle, mmogo le ka go dira gore go nne le dipeeletso go tswa kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa sa go tokafatsa matshelo batho ba ba mo tikologong ya meepo.

src_text: The disaster also left the local infrastructure, personal properties such as vehicles and several homes severely damaged.. 2 During his visit to the disaster area on Monday, 12 September 2022, President Ramaphosa expressed appreciation for the rescue and recovery efforts being undertaken in the area.
tgt_text: Puso le mekgatlho mengwe e seng ya puso tlile ka thuso ya ka bonako ka go tlamela baagi ba ba amegileng ka bonno jwa tshoganyetso, ka go ba thoba maikutlo go ba ntsha mo letshogong le go ba thusa ka dithuso tse di botlhokwa di tshwana le go ba neela dikobo, dimaterase le diphuthelwana tsa dijo.

src_text: He also pledged that government will provide the necessary support to the affected residents of Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Ga jaana metsi le motlakase di buseditswe sekeng mo lefelong leo.

src_text: Cabinet is encouraged that the owners of the mine have said that they are ready to provide technical assistance and support to the government should it be requested by the Minerals Council South Africa.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore fela fa lefelo leno le sena go phepafadiwa, basetegeniki ba tla sekaseka seemo sa dikago tsa matlo.

src_text: 3 The mining industry remains significant contributor to the economy through direct and indirect employment, export earnings, and foreign direct investment, and plays crucial role in improving the lives of people in mining communities.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso, mekgatlho ya baagi le setšhaba ka ntlha ya seabe se ba nnileng le sona mo go abelaneng ka thuso.

src_text: 4 Government and some non-governmental organisations intervened urgently by providing emergency shelter, trauma counselling and basic provisions such as blankets, mattresses and food parcels.
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: Water supply and electricity in the area have since been restored.
tgt_text: Kabinete buisane ka seemo sa ikonomi morago ga dipalopalo tsa fa gautshwane tsa Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (Stats SA) di sena go bontsha gore Letseno la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Dikuno (GDP) la kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 wetse tlase ka 0,7%.

Dintlha tse di tlhotlheleditseng kwelotlase eno di akaretsa go timiwa ga motlakase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le dituelelo tse di kwa godimo tsa dilo tse go iphedisiwang ka tsona mmogo le infoleišene.

src_text: 5 Once the disaster site has been cleaned up, technicians are expected to undertake structural assessments of houses.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di dirilweng ke Leano la Kagosešwa le Tsosoloso ya Ikonomi (ERRP) di thusitse gore naga se dubiwe ke ditsuatsue tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba ikonomi, mme gape di dirile gore ditiro le ditsela tsa go iphedisa di se latlhege.

src_text: Cabinet thanked emergency services, civil-society organisations and members of the public for their generous contributions and assistance.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di gagametseng tsa puso tsa ikonomi di simolola go ungwa maungo, jaaka go bonagetse mo dipholong tsa fa gautshwane tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe tsa Merero ya Badiri tsa Stats SA, tse di bontshitseng gore go nnile le koketsego ya ditiro di feta 648 000 magareng ga kotara ya ntlha le kotara ya bobedi mo  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso la Peoleitlho le Tshekatsheko (M&E) la Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya Bašwa (NYP).

src_text: Cabinet deliberated on the state of the economy in the country after Statistics South Africa’s (Stats SA) recent figures showed that the gross domestic product (GDP) for the second quarter of 2022 decreased by 0,7%.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse leano la go diragatsa tiro la M&E le le tla dirang gore tiro ya peoleitlho diragadiwe ka tshwanelo mmogo le tshekatsheko ya seabe sa dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP 2020-.

src_text: Factors which influenced this decrease included load-shedding, the Russia-Ukraine conflict, and the high cost of living and inflation.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tlamela ka dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tsa maemo a kwa godimo tse di lepalepantsweng le dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP.

src_text: The interventions made by the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) have largely cushioned the country from the international headwinds, and also protected jobs and livelihoods.
tgt_text: Dintlha tseno di dirilwe le baamegi ba ba maleba ba ba nang le kgatlhego mo tlhabololong le maatlafatso ya bašwa mo nageng.

src_text: Government’s strong economic interventions are beginning to bear fruit, as evidenced in Stats SA’s recent Quarterly Labour Force Survey results, which showed that over 648 000 jobs were gained between the first and second quarters of  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso e tla kokoanngwang tla aroganngwa go ya ka dingwaga, bong, bosemorafe le go ya ka mafelo bodulo dintlha tseno di tswang kwa go ona.

src_text: Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) Framework for the National Youth Policy (NYP).
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tseno tsa go baya maemo leitlho di tla dirwa mo maphateng otlhe puso, mo ditheong le mo lephateng la poraefete.

src_text: Cabinet approved the M&E framework that will enable the effective monitoring and impact assessment of the pillars of the NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Go tla kwala dipegelo tsa kotare nngwe le nngwe mme di phasaladiwe gabedi mo ngwageng.

src_text: The framework provides five high-level indicators which are aligned with the pillars of the NYP.
tgt_text: Leano la go Dira Tiro la Pholisi ya Thulaganyo e Golaganeng.

src_text: The indicators were developed with the relevant stakeholders who have an interest in the development and empowerment of youth in the country.

tgt_text: Go AkgolaKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego:Moporesidente William Samoei Ruto wa Rephaboliki ya Kenya, yo tlhomilweng ka Labobedi, 13 Lwetse 2022, go latela ditlhopho tsa bosetšhaba tse di neng di rena kagiso tse di neng di tshwerwe ka 9 Phatwe.

src_text: It will include weekly flights to Cape Town and Johannesburg  Messages.
tgt_text: Motlatsamoporesidente David Mabuza mo boemong jwa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa, le puso le batho ba Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ne tsenetse mokete ono wa go tlhomiwa mo setulong.Mokgatlho wa Rakabii wa Aforika Borwa le Motsemogolo wa Cape Town ka go tshwara ka katlego legato la borobedi la thonamente ya Rugby World Cup Sevens magareng ga la bo 9 le la bo 11 Lwetse ne le la ntlha tiragalo eno ya mabono tshwarelwa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa mme diketekete tsa balatedi ba ba neng ba tsenetse ba itemogetse lebebe la rakabii le kamogelo e tumileng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: President William Samoei Ruto of the Republic of Kenya, who was inaugurated on Tuesday, 13 September 2022, following peaceful national elections held on 9 August.
tgt_text: MatshedisoKabinete rometse matshediso go bamalapa le ditsala tsa:Bana ba sekolo ba le 18 le bagolo ba babedi ba ba tlhokafetseng mo kotsing e setlhogo kwa Pongola, kwa KwaZulu-Natala ka Labotlhano, 16 Lwetse 2022 morago ga gore lori e nang le letoroko thulane ka dinko le bene e neng pegile barutwana  Ba ba Thapilweng.

src_text: Deputy President David Mabuza attended the inauguration on behalf of President Ramaphosa, and the government and people of the Republic of South Africa.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang  Rre Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale thapilwe go okama maemo Mokaedikakaretso (DG): mo lephateng la Mokomišinara wa Bosetšhaba wa Lefapha la Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo  Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati thapilwe go okama maemo Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo lephateng la merero ya Dikolo tsa Kalafo tsa Thuto e kwa Godimo le ya go Tlhatlhelela Badiri mo Lefapheng la Boitekanelo  Rre Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki thapilwe go okama maemo Mosekasekikakaretso-Mogolo kwa Lefapheng la Temothuo, Ntšhwafatso ya Mafatshe le Tlhabololo ya Magae  Rre Phaswa Phineas Mamogale thapilwe go okama maemo Motlhankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete kwa Lefapheng la Boitekanelo.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Tshomarelo ya Metsi.

src_text: Water security.
tgt_text: Kabibete lebogile Maaforika Borwa jaaka ba ikobetse dikgato tsa go somarela metsi tse di tsentsweng tirisong mo dikarolong tse di rileng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go dira bonnete jwa gore matamo metsi ga kgale.

src_text: Cabinet thanked South Africans for adhering to water restrictions implemented in certain parts of Johannesburg, Tshwane and Ekurhuleni to stabilise the capacity of reservoirs.
tgt_text: Metsi mo matamong le mo madutelong metsi tswelela go dirisiwa ka bontsi ka ntlha ya dithemphereitšha tse di kwa godimo go ralala Gauteng, mme tiriso eno ya metsi e kwa godimo bakile gore Rand Water fokotse thata metsi e tlamelang bommasepaleng.

src_text: Dams and reservoirs remain under pressure due to high temperatures in Gauteng, and increasing demand forced Rand Water to reduce water supply to municipalities drastically.
tgt_text: Setheo se sa tlamelo ya metsi se tlamela ka metsi mantsi go batho ba feta dimilione tse 11 mo Gauteng le mo dikarolong tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisetata le Bokone Bophirima..   Maikaelelo dikgato tseno tsa go somarela metsi, tse go seng tsela epe re ka di tilang ka yona, ke go dira bonnete jwa gore re nne le metsi a sa kgaleng mme re tla tswelela go ikobela tsona go fitlha maemo tokafala.

src_text: The water utility supplies bulk potable water to more than 11 million people in Gauteng, parts of Mpumalanga, the Free State and North West.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse go baagi go tswelela go ikobela dikgato tsa go somarela metsi le go nna le seabe mo go diriseng metsi ka tshomarelo..   Go Ngala Ditiro kwa Transnet.

src_text: These unavoidable restrictions aim to secure water supply and will remain in place until the situation improves.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse tumelano ya meputso go dumelanweng ka yona ya dingwaga tse tharo magareng ga Transnet le United National Transport Union (UNTU) e tsenang tirisong go tloga ka la bo 1 Moranang 2022 go fitlha ka la bo 31 Mopitlwe.

src_text: Cabinet called on the public to continue adhering to the water restrictions and play their part by using this scarce resource sparingly.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Thuanyo, Tsereganyo le Katlholelo tseregantse mo tumelanong e e tlisitseng boipelaetso ba ditokololo tsa UNTU kwa bokhutlong ka gangwe.

src_text: Transnet strike.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gape tshwetso ya South African Transport and Allied Workers Union ya go fedisa go ngala ditiro.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the three-year wage deal reached between Transnet and the United National Transport Union (UNTU), which is applicable for the period 1 April 2022 to 31 March.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga boineelo jo bo dirilweng ke Transnet mabapi le go tsepamisa mogopolo mo tirong e saletseng kwa morago mo ditirelong tsa go rwala dithoto ka dikepe le diterene e bakilweng ke go ngala ditiro leng se se amileng ikonomi le makala a ikaegileng ka ditirelo tse ka tsela e sa itumediseng..   Kabinete lebogile tshegetso le tirisanommogo e neetsweng ke lekala la kgwebo mo pakeng ya go ngala ditiro.

src_text: The Commission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration mediated this deal, which ended the current industrial action by members of UNTU with immediate effect.
tgt_text: Tshegetso eno rotloetsa kamano e tswelelang magareng ga boeteledipele ba Transnet le badiri leng se se tla tswelang mosola setlamo se le ikonomi ya naga..   Dikamano tsa Aforika Borwa – Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the decision by the South African Transport and Allied Workers Union to call off the strike.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Leeto la Tiro le le atlegileng kwa Pusong ya Saudi Arabia ka Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la bo 15 le la bo 16 Diphalane.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the commitment by Transnet to focus on clearing backlogs that occurred across the port and rail system during the industrial action, which negatively impacted the economy and sectors that are dependent on its services..
tgt_text: Mo leetong le, dinaga tse pedi tse di saenile Dimemorantamo tsa Tirisanommogo (di-MoU) mo makaleng a farologaneng a jaaka la temothuo, la bodirelatlhapi, la meepo, la metlakase e fetlhiwang ka ditsela tse dintšhwa, la tshireletso, la dipalangwa le la temothuo ya ditlhagisiwa tsa mo metsing.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its gratitude to the support and cooperation given by business during the strike.
tgt_text: Di-MoU tse dingwe tse di saenilweng di ka ga go tlhongwa ga Lekgotla la Kgwebo ya Motlhakanelwa, tirisano mo diintasetering tsa sesole le theko, gammogo le tirisano mo makaleng dipatlisiso tsa thutamaje.

src_text: It encourages continuous relationship between Transnet management and labour for the benefit of the company and the economy of the country.
tgt_text: Moporesitente dirisitse leeto le go laletsa dikgwebo tsa Saudi Arabia go tsenela khonferense ya botlhano ya peeletso ya Aforika Borwa e tla tshwarwang ka.

src_text: South Africa – Saudi Arabia relations.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebisani le Aforika Borwa wa maemo bobedi ka bogolo mo Dinageng tsa Botlhabagare bile ke lefelo le legolo le dinaga tsa kgaolo eno di rekang mo go lona ditlhagisiwa.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful Working Visit to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by President Cyril Ramaphosa on 15 and 16 October.
tgt_text: Dikamano tsa boditšhaba magareng ga dinaga tsoopedi di nnile le seabe se sentle mo mererong ya kgwebisano le bobeeletsi..   Peeletso mo Mafaratlhatlheng.

src_text: During the visit, the two countries signed 17 Memoranda of Understanding (MoUs) in various fields such as agriculture, fisheries, mining, renewable energy, security, transport and aquaculture.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go thankgololwa ga polante ya tlhagiso ya maemo a kwa godimo ka motlhagisi yo gaisang wa boditšhaba, ALPLA Group, kwa Lanseria mo Gauteng.

src_text: Other MoUs signed are on the establishment of Joint Business Council, cooperation in the field of military industries and procurements, and on geological survey cooperation.
The President used the visit to invite Saudi Arabia businesses to South Africa’s fifth investment conference that will be held in.
tgt_text: Se se netefatsa boineelo ba ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa ba go tlhoma tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha jaaka tsela e ka tsosang ikonomi le go oketsa ditiro..   Peeletso ya bokana ka didolara tse dimilione tse 50 ke seabe sa botlhokwa mo leaning le legolong la Toropokgolo ya Ditirodintsi ya Lanseria e tla kgweetsang tswelelo le tirisogape gammogo le go tlhola le go boloka ditiro tse.

src_text: Saudi Arabia is South Africa’s second largest trading partner in the Middle East and the largest source of imports from the region.
tgt_text: Mo go yona go akarediwa lenaneo la go ithutela tiro la baithutela mekhateroniki ba le 36 le borathekeniki ba tirisogape ba ditirelo tsa ALPLA go ralala borwa jwa Aforika.

src_text: International relations between both countries have resulted in positive effect on trade and investment trends.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la go ithutela tiro le tla simolola ka 2023, mme baithutela tiro ba ntlha ba le 12 ba Aforika Borwa ba tla bo ba tswa mo mafelong selegae..   Ditiragalo tsa Meepo tse di seng mo Molaong.

src_text: Infrastructure investment.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong di phuaganya metse mo setšhabeng sa borona mmogo le ikonomi ya rona, le go baka tatlhegelo ya lotseno go bobedi puso le lekala la meepo..   Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go amogiwa moselesele wa ditlhobolo le go tshwarwa ga babelaelwa ba le 20 ba ba golaganngwang le ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong ka nako ya letsholo le le neng la dirwa kwa šafoteng ya moepo wa Stilfontein kwa Bokone Bophirima..   Kabinete ikuela go Maaforika Borwa go tswelela go dirisana le ditheo tsa molao go dira bonnete jwa gore matsholo thibelo ya bosenyi isago le ona atlega.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the commissioning of state-of-the-art plastics production plant by leading international manufacturer, the ALPLA Group, at Lanseria in Gauteng.
tgt_text: Se se tla romela molaetsa o bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo duele, le gore disenyi di tla tshwarwa le go sekisiswa ntle le poifo kgotsa kgethololo..   Motlakase.

src_text: This augments President Ramaphosa’s commitment to position infrastructure development as means to stimulate the economy and increase employment..
tgt_text: Go sale gale Eskom saenile ditumelano tsa kadimo tsa dingwaga tse 30 le babeeletsi ba bafetlhi ba ba ba ikemetseng ba motlakase ba le bane go aga mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhiwa ga motlakase o phepa kwa diteišeneng tsa motlakase tsa Majuba le Tutuka kwa Mpumalanga.

src_text: The investment worth US$50 million is key contribution to the Lanseria Smart City masterplan that will drive sustainability and recycling as well as create and sustain 350 jobs.
tgt_text: Dikadimo tse tsa lefatshe di tla ngoka peeletso e lekanyediwang go diranta di le dibilione tse.

src_text: Included is an apprenticeship programme for 36 mechatronics and recycling technicians for ALPLA Group operations across southern Africa.
The apprentice programme will commence in 2023, with the first 12 South African apprentices coming from local communities.
tgt_text: Babeeletsi ba bane ba - HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le  Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tla tsenya bonnye dimekawate di le 2 000 mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase bosetšhaba..   Mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhwa ga motlakase solofelwa go golaganngwa mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase mo dikgweding tse 24 go ya go 36 go tloga ka konosetso ya tsa matlole, go ikaegilwe ka ditetlelelo tsa tikologo, tlhaolo ya lefatshe le tse dingwe tsa taolo..   Dikgato tsa go Dira Bonnete jwa gore Naga ga Tlhaele Dijo.

src_text: Illegal mining.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Kopano ya Agri SA ya 2022 tshwarelwe kwa Pretoria ka la bo 13 le la bo 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Re Kotula seo re se Jetseng ka fa Nageng”.

src_text: Illegal mining hurts communities and our economy, and results in loss of revenue for both government and the mining sector..
tgt_text: Kopano e ne buisanela merero e jaaka go dira gore maanomagolo temothuo direle balemi ba naga; mafaratlhatlha a boikanyego tlhagiso ya dijo ya selegae go isa isagong, le go matlafatsa bokgoni ba batlhagisi ba dijo go dira ka ditlhagiswa tse di jetsweng mono..   Mo dikgatong tse dingwe gape tsa go dira bonnete jwa gore naga ga tlhaele dijo, Kabinete amogetse gape go thankgololwa ga Sefala sa Bosetšhaba sa Tshireletso ya Dimela le Diphologolo, ke Lenaneo la Semphato sa Itlhamelo mo go tsa Temothuo le Ikonomi ya Dimela le Diphologolo sa Lefapha la Saense le Boitlhamelo, ka tirisano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the seizure of firearms cache and the arrest of 20 suspects linked to illegal mining during an operation at mineshaft in Stilfontein in North West.
tgt_text: Sefala se se tla tshegetsa thibelo, phokotso le taolo ya malwetse dimela le diphologolo leng se se tla oketsang tlhagiso, tshireletso ya dijo le tlhabololo e tsepameng ya metsemagae   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Cabinet appeals to South Africans to continue working with law-enforcement agencies to ensure the success of future anti-crime operations.
tgt_text: Mametlelelo ya Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng ya Mokgatlo wa Tirisano ya Aforika (AU).

src_text: This will send strong message that crime does not pay, and that criminals will be arrested and prosecuted without fear or favour..   Energy.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tšhata ya AU ka ga Meono le Melawana ya Tsamaiso e Seng ya Bogareng, Bobusi ba Selegae le Tlhabololo ya Selegae gore mametlelelwe.

src_text: Eskom recently signed 30-year lease agreements with four independent power producer investors to construct new clean-energy generation capacity at Majuba and Tutuka power stations in Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa saenile Tšhata ka Phatwe.

src_text: The land leases will attract an estimated investment of about R40 billion.

The four investors – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group and Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – will contribute at least 2 000 megawatts to the national electricity grid.
tgt_text: Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng tlamela letlhomeso go dinaga tsotlhe tse leng ditokololo setlankana sa kaedi ka ga tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya dithata le ditiro go tswa go puso ya bosešhaba go ya go makala mangwe puso.

src_text: The new generation capacity is expected to be connected to the grid within 24 to 36 months from financial closure, subject to environmental, land zoning and other regulatory approvals.
tgt_text: Tšhata samagana bogolo le tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya thata le ditiro, letlhomeso la bobusi ba selegae le tlhabololo ya selegae..   Lekgotla la Boditšhaba la Ngwaga le Ngwaga la bo 32 la Pabalesego mo Diporong (IRSC).

src_text: Food security.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga Kopano ya Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya bo 32 ya IRSC kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka 1 go fitlha ka 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Poposešwa ya diporo mo Lefatsheng le le sa tlhomamisegeng”.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the Agri SA Congress 2022 in Pretoria on 13 and 14 October 2022 under the theme: “Growing Local”.
tgt_text: RSC ke kopano sa boditšhaba e kopanyang dirutegi mo mererong ya pabalesego ya diporo go ralala lefatshe go abelana maitemogelo bona ka maikaelelo go tokafatsa pabalesego ya diporo..   Jaaka tokololo ya IRSC, Molaodi wa Taolo ya Diporo wa Aforika Borwa nnile moamogelabaeng wa kopano la bofelo ka.

src_text: The congress engaged on issues such as making agriculture masterplans work for local growers; sustainable infrastructure for locally grown food; making the local environment sustainable for local food production into the future, and strengthening food producers’ capacity to process locally grown produce.

In further prioritising food security, Cabinet also welcomed the launch of the National Biosecurity Hub, by the Department of Science and Innovation's Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, in collaboration with the University of Pretoria.
tgt_text: Seralwa sa Leano la Mafaratlhatlha Bosetšhaba la 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya bo.

src_text: The hub will support the prevention, reduction and management of crop and animal disease, which will contribute to increased productivity, food security and sustainable rural development   Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go phasaladiwa ga seralwa sa NIP 2050 Kgato ya bo 2 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi.

src_text: Ratification of the Decentralisation Charter of the African Union (AU).
tgt_text: Leano le le neelana ka tsela ya go matlafatsa le go tlaleletsa diporojeke tsa puso tse di golaganeng..

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament the AU Charter on the Values and Principles of Decentralisation, Local Governance and Local Development for ratification.
tgt_text: Le tlhagisa diporojeke tsa botlhokwa tsa mafelobonno batho; motlakase wa bommasepala; metsi; matlakala a popota; dipalangwa; mafaratlhatlha thuto le boitekanelo; mafaratlhatlha dijithale, le bosenyi le bobodu..   Popego ya leano le tlamela ka ponelopele ya karolo e tshwanetseng go lejwa tlamela ka tshekatsheko ya maemo ga jaana tlhalosa dipeelo tse di botlhokwa go netefatsa katlego le go tlhalosa tse di tshwanetseng go dirwa go fitlhelela ponelopele eo tshitshinya tsela ya tsenyotirisong e tshwanetseng go dirwa mo pakeng ya dingwaga tse tharo tsa leanotiro..   Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.

src_text: South Africa signed the charter in August..
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.

src_text: The Decentralisation Charter provides framework to all member states guiding document on the decentralisation of powers and functions from national to other spheres of government.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso le le phasaladitswe ka 2021 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi..   Letlhomeso le le tlamela ka dipilara tse tlhano tsa ditsereganyo mo go direng Bodiredipuso ba porofešenale.

src_text: The charter deals largely with the decentralisation of authority and functions, local governance framework and local development.
tgt_text: Dipilara tse di akaretsa go ngoka le tlhaolo ya pele ga go tsena mo Bodiredipusong; peodinakong le tshimololo; thulaganyo le taolo ya tiragatso; thuto e tswelelang le tlhabololo ya porofešenale; le tlhatlogo ka maemo mo tirong le ditiragalo mo tirong..   Diphetogo mo Dipeelong tsa Tiro tsa Bakaedikakaretso (bo DG).

src_text: 32nd Annual International Railway Safety Council (IRSC).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo e tshitshinyang mekgwa ya go matlafatsa nonofo le bokgoni ba bo DG mo Bodiredipusong.

src_text: Cabinet approved the hosting of the 32nd Annual IRSC Meeting in Johannesburg from 1 to 6 October 2023 under the theme: “Reshaping railways in an uncertain World”.
tgt_text: Pegelo e dirile ditshitshinyo di le mmalwa, go akaretsa paka ya tiro ya bo DG le taolo ya maatlatiro ka Bothati ba Khuduthamaga go bantlhankedi ba ba rweleng maikarabelo..   Pegelo e tshitshintse gape gore DG mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente tla tsewa gape le Tlhogo ya Botsamaisi ba Puso.

src_text: The IRSC is an international forum that brings together railway safety professionals from all over the world to exchange experiences so as to improve railway safety..   As member of the IRSC, South Africa’s Railway Safety Regulator last hosted this forum in.
tgt_text: Mo diporofenseng, tiro e tla newa oDG ba ba mo dikantorong tsa Ditonakgolo.

src_text: Draft National Infrastructure Plan 2050 (NIP 2050) Phase.
tgt_text: Pegelo e tshitshintse gape mekgwa ya go kaela mafapha ka ga taolo ya dikonteraka tsa bo DG..   Tsamaiso ya Taolo ya Tiragatso ntšhwa ya bo DG a tlhabololwa go nyalanya le diphetogo tse di dumeletsweng..   Tona ya Nama-o-Tshwere ya Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi, Rre Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa kopano ya bobegakgang mo bekeng e tlang go tlhalosa Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale le go tlhagisa gape le diphetogo tse di letleletsweng mo dipeelong tsa tiro ya bo DG..   Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya Lekwalopuso la Mabudusatsela ka ga Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (WPRPD) ya 2020-.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the draft NIP 2050 Phase 2 for public consultation.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya WPRPD e tlhagisang peodinakong ka go tsenngwa tirisong ga WPRPD.

src_text: The plan offers direction in strengthening and augmenting government strategic integrated projects..
tgt_text: Pegelo e akaretsa ditshitshinyo go tswa go mafapha puso bosetšhaba le diporofense tlamela ka peodinakong ka ga tsenyotiriosong ya pholisi e akaretsang kabo ya matlole..   Pegelongwaga ya ntlha ya tswelopele phasaladitswe ka.

src_text: It identifies the strategic projects in human settlements; municipal electricity; water; solid waste; passenger transport; education and health infrastructure; digital infrastructure, and crime and corruption.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Tswelopele ya botlhano letleletswe go phasaladiwa ka kuranta ya puso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.

src_text: The format of the plan provides vision of the area to be tackled, offers an assessment of the current status, outlines the essential conditions for success and states what needs to be done to achieve the vision.
It proposes the implementation process to be taken over the three-year running cycle action plan.
tgt_text: Tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya Tumelano ka ga go Fedisiwa ga Mefuta yotlhe ya Kgethololo Kgatlhanong le Basadi (CEDAW).

src_text: National Implementation Framework towards the Professionalisation of the Public Service.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore mametlelelwe.

src_text: Cabinet approved the National Implementation Framework towards the Professionalisation of the Public Service.
tgt_text: Diphetogo tse di tlamela ka paka e okeditsweng ya dikopano tsa komiti e sekasekang dipegelo tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo..   Aforika Borwa saenile tumelano ka 1993 le go mametlelela ka Sedimonthole.

src_text: The framework was published for public consultation in.
tgt_text: Go romelwa kwa Palamenteng go senka go golaganya tumelano e mametleletsweng mo malobeng le tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya tumelano .
Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto Tebang le Thuto Kgolwane.

src_text: The framework provides five pillars on interventions in professionalising the Public Service.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto tebang le Thuto Kgolwane gore tsenngwe molaong semmuso.

src_text: The pillars include pre-entry recruitment and selection within the Public Service; induction and onboarding; planning and performance management; continuous learning and professional development, and career progression and career incidents.
tgt_text: Fa sena go tsenngwa molaong semmuso tla romelwa go Mokgatlo wa Thuto, Saenthifiki le Setso wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) le mono gae tla nna karolo ya Molao wa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Naga la Makwalothuto wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008)..   Tumelano eno ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe tlhoma melawana ya lefatshe ka bophara ya Kamogelo ya makwalothuto ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane le makwalothuto mangwe ka go dira gore lefatshe ka bophara go se nne le makwalothotu a sa tseeweng tsiya a nang le lehunelo, le a sa tlhaolweng.

src_text: Changes in the conditions of employment for Directors-General (DGs).
tgt_text: Tumelano eno neela tetla ya gore makwalothuto dinaga disele mo dinageng tse 193 tse leng ditokololo tsa UN amogelwe ke dinaga tseno..   Kgogelomorago ya Ditokafatso mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.

src_text: Cabinet approved the report that proposes measures to strengthen the capacity and capability of the DGs in the Public Service.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhomamisitse pegelo e dirilweng ke Kantoro ya ga Moporesitente ka Mosupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogela morago diphetogo tse di dirilweng tsa 2022 mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga e bidiwang gape Bukana ya Ditona..   Ditokafatso tse di dirilweng ka Moranang 2022 di tlamela ka mothamo o okeditsweng mo dikantorong tse dingwe tsa Ditona tse di nang le maikarabelo makala feta bongwe.

src_text: The report made several proposals,  including the tenure of DGs and the management of delegations by the Executive Authority to the accounting officers..
tgt_text: Di ne di tlhagisa gape gore Puso tshwanetse go rwala maikarabelo ka botlalo ditshenyegelo tse di jaaka tlamelo ya motlakase le metsi kwa mafelobonnong semmuso maloko khuduthamaga..   Kabinete etse tlhoko dingongorego tsa baagi mme sweditse go leba sešwa Kaedi ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.

src_text: The report also proposed that the DG in The Presidency will be designated as the Head of Public Administration.
tgt_text: Tiragalo e tla dirwa ke setheo se se ikemetseng mme fa sena go konosediwa, kaedi e tla phasaladiwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi: www.dpsa.gov.za..  Semphato sa Phetogo e Lolameng sa Maatla (JETP) le Leano la JETP (JEPT-IP).

src_text: In the provinces, this function will be designated to the DGs in the offices of the Premiers.
tgt_text: Morago ga go amogela tlhagisetso ya JEPT le JETP-IP, Kabinete ne ya mametlelela JETP-IP le go supa ditebogo ka tiro e botlalo e dirilweng go tlhagisa..   JETP-IP tlhalosa dipeeletso tse di tlhokegang go fitlhelela boineelo ba Puso ya Aforika Borwa ba go fedisa khabone le go tsweletsa kgolo e tswelelang, le go netefatsa phetogo e lolameng go badiri le mafelo a amegang..   Komiti ya Ditona ya Phetogo ya Tlelaemete tla tshwara kopano ya bobegakgang mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo go neela ka dintlha ka botlalo   Melaotlhomo.

src_text: The report further proposed measures to guide departments on the management of contracts of DGs.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa.

src_text: The revised Performance Management System for DGs is being revised to align it with the approved changes.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa 2022 kwa Palamenteng go diragadiwa.

src_text: The Acting Minister of Public Service and Administration, Mr Thulas Nxesi, will next week convene media briefing to outline the National Implementation Framework towards the Professionalisation of the Public Service and also unpack the approved changes in the conditions of employment for DGs.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o tlhabolola Molao wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe, 1957 (Molao 57 wa 1951) o setseng le dingwaga di le.

src_text: Fifth Progress Report on the Implementation of the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (WPRPD) 2020-.
Cabinet approved the Fifth Progress Report on the Implementation of the WPRPD, which provides an update on the implementation of the WPRPD.
tgt_text: Fa sena go amogelwa jaaka molao, Molaotlhomo o tla tlamela ka letlhomeso la semolao go laola tsamaiso ya boleng ya dikepe.

src_text: The report covers inputs from national and provincial government departments.
tgt_text: Gareng ga tse dingwe tla laola popego, kwadiso, maina le go fedisiwa ga dikepe..   Diphetogo tse di tla nna le seabe mo go tsosoloseng lekala la tsamaiso ya dithoto ka dikepe gammogo le go nyalanya naga le Tumelano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhaba wa Pharakano ya Dikepe.

src_text: It provides updates on the policy implementation that include budget allocations..
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa mametleletse tumelano     .

src_text: The first annual progress report was published in.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa.

src_text: This fifth progress report has been approved to be gazetted and published by the Department of Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa 2022 gore tswelediwe.

src_text: Amendment to Article 20(1) of the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o tshitshinya tokafatso ya Molao wa Ditlhopho, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the amendment to Article 20(1) of the CEDAW for ratification.
tgt_text: Diphetogo di tlamela ka tlhabololo le tsenyotirisong ya Tsamaiso ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo e tshegetsang ditshwetso tse di tshegediwang ke bopaki..   Di matlafatsa kgolagano magareng ga Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa le ditheo tse dingwe tsa puso, le go atolosa letlhomeso la taolo la Molao D.  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: The amendments provide for an increased duration of the committee meetings that process the member states’ reports.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente ya Dikgwebopotlana, tse Dinnye le tse di Magareng (SMME) le Dikoporasi.

src_text: South Africa signed this convention in 1993 and subsequently ratified it in December.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, ka tirisano le bannaleseabe ba lekala la poraefete, le tla tshwara Samiti ya SMME le Dikoporasi ya Moporesitente ya Bosetšhaba kwa Bryanston, Gauteng ka 13 go fitlha ka 15 Ngwanatsele..   Samiti e tla kopanya bannaleseabe ba botlhokwa ba lekala la poraefete le la puso mo tikologong ya dikgwebopotlana go rerisana ka go senka ditsela tsa go dirisana mmogo go matlafatsa lekala le.

src_text: The submission to Parliament seeks to align the previously ratified convention with the amendment to Article 20(1) of the convention.
tgt_text: Bannaleseabe ba ba solofelwang ba akaretsa mekgatlo ya kgwebo, badiri ba diSMME, dirutegi, badiri ba dipholisi le ditheo tsa tlhabololo ya matlole..     Samiti tla rerisana gape le ka ga Leanolegolo le le Momaganeng la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, le le tlamelang ka letlhomeso le le botlhokwa go matlafatsa lekala la SMME.

src_text: Global Convention on the Recognition of Qualifications concerning Higher Education .
tgt_text: Samiti e solofelwa gape go thankgolola Dikabo tsa Bosetšhaba tsa SMME tsa Moporesitente tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga..     Go Tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente ya 2022 ya Tirisodikgoka e Ikaegileng ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Global Convention on the Recognition of Qualifications concerning Higher Education for ratification.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Samiti ya bobedi ya Moporesitente ya GBVF kwa Gallagher Convention Centre mo Gauteng ka 1 le 2 Ngwanatsele.

src_text: Once ratified it will be deposited to the United Nations (UN) Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization and domestically enabled through the National Qualifications Framework Act, 2008 (Act 67 of 2008).
tgt_text: Samiti ya ntlha e neng tshwerwe ka 2018 ne ya dirisiwa go supa boineelo gape ba puso le balekane ba loago mo go fediseng ditiragalo tse di kwa godimo tsa tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le basadi mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla dirisiwa go lekola Tswelopele e dirilweng mo go tsenngweng tirisong ga Togamaano ya Bosetšhaba ka ga GBVF tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Boikarabelo; Itlhaganediso le Kgodiso JAANONG”..   Samiti e tla sekaseka gareng ga tse dingwe, go batla ditsela tsa go itlhaganedisa dikgato le maikarabelo go tswa go mafapha botlhokwa le bannaleseabe ba ba akaretsang baagi, lekala la poraefete le mekgatlo ya badiri..   Pitso ya Botlhano ya ga Moporesitente kwa Kapa Botlhaba.

src_text: The Global Convention establishes universal principles for fair, transparent and non-discriminatory recognition of higher education qualifications and qualifications.
tgt_text: Pitso ya Botlhano ya Mokgwa wa Tlhabololo ya Sedika (DDM) ya ga Moporesitente kwa Upington, Kapa Botlhaba tla diragala ka Labotlhano, 21 Diphalane 2022 kwa Setediamong sa selegae sa Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Pitso ya Moporesitente ya DDM tla lekola tswelelo ya thebolelo ya ditirelo le dikgwetlho kwa Kapa Botlhaba le go tsereganya go di rarabolola.

src_text: It allows for the recognition of foreign qualifications in 193 UN member states.
tgt_text: DDM netefatsa gore thulaganyo, tsenyotirisong le kabelomatlole ya thebolelo ya ditirelo di momagantswe go tokafatsa thebolelo ya ditirelo go baagi..   Jaaka matlhagolatsela Pitso e, Ditona, maloko dikhuduthamaga le bommeyara ba tla tswa letsholo go ya kwa baaging ba kwa Upington le mafelo a mabapi..   Puo ya Pholisi ya Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole mo Pakeng ya Dikgwedi di le Tharo (MTBPS).

src_text: Withdrawal of the amendments to the Guide for Members of the Executive.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 e tla alwang ke Tona ya Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo e botlhokwa ya tsamaiso e bulegileng ya Aforika Borwa ya tekanyetsokabo e maikarabelo..   MTBPS tlhalosa boineelo ba puso mo teng ga maemo palogotlhe ya tiriso ya matlole naga ka kgonang tlhalosa gape le gore puso tla tswala jang mokhino fa gare ga lotseno le ditshenyegelo, le go dirisa matlotlo a leng teng ka tshwanelo.

src_text: Cabinet endorsed the announcement made by The Presidency on Monday, 17 October 2022 to withdraw the amendments made to the Guide for Members of the Executive, also called the Ministerial Handbook, for..
