The amendments that were made in April 2022 provided for additional capacity to some of the offices of the Ministers who are responsible for more than one portfolio.
tgt_text: Ditlhatlhobo tsa Materiki.

src_text: They also required the State to take over full responsibility for the costs associated with the provision of electricity and water to official residences occupied by members of the executive..
tgt_text: Ditlhatlhobo tsa Setifikheiti se Segolwane sa Bosetšhaba di simolola ka 31 Diphalane go fitlha ka 7 Sedimonthole.

src_text: Cabinet noted the concerns raised by the public and resolved to review the Guide for Members of the Executive.
tgt_text: Kabinete eleletsa setlhopha sa 2022 masego jaaka ba tla bo ba samagana le legato la bofelo la leeto la bona la sekolo.

src_text: This process will be handled by neutral structure and once completed, the guide will be made public through the Department of Public Service and Administration’s website: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: Tshegetso e tswelelang go tswa go barutisi, batsadi le batlhokomedi tla nna botlhokwa thata mo go thuseng baithuti ba go samagana le ditlhatlhobo tse ka boitshepo..   Kabinete ikuela go batsadi le batlhokomedi go nna le seabe ka go rotloetsa le go tlhotlheletsa baithuti, gammogo le go tlhola tikologo e siametseng go ithuta kwa gae..   Khonferense ya Leanotlhabololo la Bosetšhaba (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Naga.

src_text: Just Energy Transition Partnership (JETP) and JETP Investment Plan (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Lefapha le Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi ka semphato le Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Togamaano le Lefapha la Dithuto tsa Tlhabololo la Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal, le tla tshwara khonferense ya NDP le Bokgoni ba Naga go tloga ka 7 go fitlha ka 9 Ngwanatsele 2022 kwa Khamphaseng ya Kholeji ya Howard ya Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Khonferense e tla lekola bokgoni le tiragatso ya puso mo dingwageng tse 10 tsa ntlha tsa NDP, mme tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Tekolo ya Bokgoni ba Naga le Tiragatso ya Puso mo dingwageng tse lesome tsa ntlha tsa NDP”..   Go Neelwa Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini.

src_text: After welcoming presentation on the JETP and the JETP-IP, Cabinet endorsed the JETP-IP and expressed its appreciation of the detailed work undertaken to develop it..
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla neela Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Motlotlegi Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Moses Mabhida kwa Durban ka Lamatlhatso, 29 Diphalane..

src_text: The JETP-IP outlines the investments required to achieve the decarbonisation commitments made by the Government of South Africa while promoting sustainable development, and ensuring just transition for affected workers and communities..
tgt_text: Se se latela moletlo wa setso wa go tlhoma kgosi wa “Ukungena eSibayeni” wa Kgosi o neng tshwerwe ka 20 Phatwe 2022 o mo tlhatloseditseng mo setulong sa bogosi jaaka Kgosi ya Setšhaba sa amaZulu   Melaetsa.

src_text: The Inter-Ministerial Committee on Climate Change will soon hold media briefing to provide more details   Bills.
tgt_text: Go akgolaKabinete akgola le go eleletsa masego: Rre Sam Matekane, Rre yo tlhophilweng go nna Tonakgolo ya Puso ya Lesotho.

src_text: Merchant Shipping Bill of.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape inyalantse le Setlhopha sa Tshekatsheko ya Ditlhopho sa AU kwa Ditlhophong tsa Kokoanobosetšhaba kwa Pusong ya Lesotho ka la bo 7 Diphalane 2022 mo go akgoleng tsepamo ya ditlhopho le sepolotiki ya Batho ba Puso ya Lesotho go bo ba tshwere ditlhopho tse di atlegileng.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the submission of the Merchant Shipping Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tswelela go ineela mo go matlafatseng le go tiiseng dikamano tsa sebedi gammogo le go kgontsha tirisano mo mererong ya dikgatlhegelo tse di tshwanang mo kgaolong, kontinente le go ralala lefatshe..   Matshediso Kabinete rometse melaetsa ya matshidiso go lelapa le ditsala tsa ga: Rre Albert Nolan (88), Moperisita wa Catholic ya Aforika Borwa yo boineelo yo neng gwetlha dikakanyo tsa sedumedi tse di neng di batla go mametlelela tsamaiso ya tlhaolele.

src_text: The Bill overhauls the 70-year-old Merchant Shipping Act, 1951 (Act 57 of 1951).
tgt_text: Ka 2003, Moporesitente wa nako eo Thabo Mbeki ne mo neela Kabo ya Luthuli ya Selefera ka ntlha ya “boineelo ba gagwe ba botshelo botlhe go kgaratlhela temokerasi, ditshwanelo tsa botho le bosiamisi le go gwetlha tsamaiso ya sedumedi go akaretsa mametlelelo ya tlhaolele ka tsela ya sedumedi.”   Go Thapiwa.

src_text: Once enacted, the Bill will provide the merchant shipping legal framework to regulate ships’ value chain.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang   Atefokheiti James Mlawu – Mokaedikakaretso: Lefapha la Dipalangwa   Rre Shabeer Khan – Ramatlotlo-Kakaretso: Matlotlo Bosetšhaba.

src_text: It will regulate amongst others the designing, registration, naming and scrapping of ships.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumalane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.

src_text: These changes will contribute towards reviving the maritime transport sector and also aligning the country with the International Maritime Organisation Convention.
tgt_text: Maloko Boto ya Bojanala ya Aforika Borwa   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Monnasetilo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatsa Monnasetilo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Rre Odwa Mtati   Rre Ravi Nadasen thapilwe gape)   Rre Enver Duminy thapilwe gape)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Rre Mduduzi Zakwe thapilwe gape)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.

src_text: South Africa has ratified this convention.
tgt_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa lefapha).

Maloko Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Pharakano ya Ditsela   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe thapilwe gape)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge thapilwe gape)   Moporofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Monnasetilo)   Atefokheiti Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moporofesara Chitja Twala   Rre Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Leloko la thefosano); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Leloko la thefosano).

src_text: Statistics Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Rre Tshepo Monaheng – Motlhankedi Khuduthamaga (CEO): Setlamo sa Aforika Borwa sa Merero ya Dikgwa (Konteraka ntšhwafaditswe sebaka sa dingwaga tse tharo (3)).

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Statistics Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.
tgt_text: Rre Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ditsela sa Aforika Borwa..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Molaodi wa Nutlere wa Bosetšhaba..   Rre Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalo-Kakaretso (Ntšhwafatso ya Konteraka).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga Tirisodikgoka e Totileng Batho ba Bong jo bo Rileng le Dipolao tsa Basadi (GBVF).

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga GBVF kwa Gallagher Estate kwa Midrand, Gauteng ka la bo 1 le la bo 2 Ngwanaitseele 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Rwala Maikarabelo, Go Potlakisa Twantsho ya Ditiro Tseno mmogo le Go Dira Modumo ka Tsona, GONA JAANONG!”.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Mo samiting eno go builwe ka kgatelopele eo setseng dirilwe mo go tsenyeng tirisong maikano a dirilweng mo Samiting eno ya Moporesitente e neng tshwerwe mo ngwageng wa 2018, mo go neng ga totobadiwa maikano naga eno go nna le ditharabololo tse di mosola tse di lekaneng tsa go lwantsha GBVF re le seoposengwe..     Bao ba neng ba tsaya karolo kwa samiting eno e tsereng matsatsi le mabedi ba ne ba rwala maikarabelo ka tiro e dirilweng mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la Naga la Togamaano mo Mererong ya GBVF leng leano leo maitlhomo lona leng go dira gore go nne le pholisi le leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng ka thulaganyo le nngwe gore re kgone go matlakafatsa dikgato tsa go tsibogela bothata jono jwa GBVF re le puso bile re le naga yotlhe..     Samiti eno ne le yona e tlhokagalang gore batho ba bue puo pha ka tseo ba atlegileng mo go tsona le tseo santseng le tlhobaboroko mo go lwantshaneng le GBVF.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: Mo samiting eno go builwe gape le ka botlhokwa jwa go ipopa ngatana mmogo le ka dilo tse ditona tse di ka fitlhelelwang fa re na le tsotlhe tse di tlhokagalang go lwantshana le bothata jono le fa tsotlhe tseo di dirisiwa ka tshwanelo.

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Seo re utlwaneng ka sona kwa samiting eno se bontsha botlhokwa jwa tirisanommogo puso nang le yona le maphata mangwe mekgatlho ya baagi, dikgwebo, bao dirisanang le bona mo go fetoleng maemo, ba dikereke mmogo le maphata mangwe jaaka botlhe ba dirisana mmogo mo go lwantshaneng le GBVF..     Tse dingwe tsa ditharabololo tse di tlhagisitsweng ke go tlamela NSP ka matlole a lekaneng gore kgone go samagana le GBVF, go dira gore fa go ka fitlhelwang ba sa dira seo ba tshwanetseng go se dira ba di game ba sa di tlhapela, mmogo le go dira gore ditheo tsa naga, tsa diporofense le tsa dkgaolo tseo leng tsona tseo batho ba ikarabelang mo go tsona di neelwa matla mantsi go kgalema ditiro tseo di sa tsamayeng ka tshwanelo..     Kabinete ne ya gatelela gore ga go tiragalo epe ya tirisodikgoka kgotsa ya go bogisa batho ba bangwe go tla itshokelwang yona.

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging gore ba tobane mo matlhong le ditiragalo tsa GBVF ka go tshwarisa beng ba tsona kwa mapodising.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: Gotlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona re tshwanetse go dira gore go nne boima gore go diragale ditiragalo tsa GBVF.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: Tshireletsego le pabalesego.

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Kabinete netefaleditse baagi gore Setheo sa Naga sa Ditheo tse di Kopaneng go Lwantshana le Botlhokotsebe le go Abelana ka Tshedimosetso e ka ga Bosenyi (NATJOINTS) – seo mo go sona leng mafapha puso a farologaneng mo Setho sa Phemelo ya Puso (SSA) leng sona se se di gogang kwa pele mmogo le Setheo sa Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) le Setheo sa Masole Naga (SANDF) - jaaka ba na le batlhankedi ba tiro ya bona leng go batlisisa ditiro tsa bokhukhuntshwane tse di bayang mo kotsing tshireletso ya naga ya rona mmogo le tsona ditiro tsa menolopuso.

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: NATJOINTS sekaseka maemo pabalesego ka fa nageng gangwe le gape go bona gore ga go matshosetsi a rileng a tshosetsang pabalesego.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Jaaka le karolo ya ditumelano magareng ga ditheo tsa go lwantsha botlhokotsebe mo dinageng tse dingwe tsotlhe, Aforika Borwa le yona bona dipoelo mo ntlheng ya go abelana ka tshedimosetso e ka dirang bonnete jwa gore naga a bolokesega..     Kabinete ikuela mo baaging go nna ba ntshitse matlho dinameng mme ba begele ditheo tsa molao ka ga sengwe le sengwe se ba se belaelang le se se seng mo molaong seke wa didimala; fa bona sengwe se se belaetsang, begela ditheo tsa molao - fa rotlhe re dirisana re ka kgona go dira gore setšhaba sa rona se babalesege.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Puo ya Ngwaga wa 2022 ya Pholisi ya Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole mo Pakeng ya Dikgwedi di le Tharo (MTBPS).

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga dikgato tse di tsentsweng tirisong mo go MTBPS ya 2022 tse di ka ga go busetsa maemo matlole puso sekeng, le fa maemo ikonomi lefatshe tshosa..     Dikgato tse Tona ya Matlole Rre Enoch Godongwana buileng ka tsona kwa Palamenteng, kwa Motsekapa ka Laboraro wa la bo 26 Diphalane 2022 di ne di tsenyeletsa le go fokotsa thata tiriso ya matlole puso mo go dirisiwang matlole mantsi go feta go kgonnweng go kokoanya mo lekgetong maitlhomo le go tokafats leano la naga ya rona la go tsamaisa tiro ya matlole, go ema nokeng maemo rona mo ikonoming mmogo le go dira gore moAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe nne le tshepo e tletseng gore maemo ikonomi ya naga ya rona mo isagong tla fetoga.

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: Maano a leng teng go oketsa matlole go emela motsi wa tlala re thusa gore re kgone go samagana le mathata tshwana le a tlhodilweng ke tlhago.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: MTBPS ya 2022 re thusa gape le gore re kgone go kgarametsa dilo tse di botlhokwa mo mafaratlhatlheng rona mmogo le mo matsholong kabo ya ditirelo, mmogo le go dira gore re nne le ditharabololo tse dingwe tse di ka ga thusang baagi ba naga ya rona ba ba dikobodikhutshwane mmogo le ba ba leng mo tlalelong..     Kabinete ikuela mo makaleng otlhe a samaganang le merero ya go tswela baagi le ikonomi mosola gore dirisane le puso gore kgone go godisa ikonomi ya rona gore kgone go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba naga yotlhe ya rona.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: Tirisanommogo magareng ga naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Spain.

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Leeto la Semmuso la go jela naga ya Aforika Borwa nala ke Tonakgolo ya naga ya Spain Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón go tla go tsosolosa botsalano jo bo leng teng jwa dinaga tseno go dira gore bo gagamale le go feta.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Tonakgolo ne felegeditswe ke Tona ya bona ya Lefapha la Diintaseteri, Kgwebisano le Bojanala bong Mme Reyes Maroto, mmogo le beng ba dikgwebo ba naga eo.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Leeto leno le neile beng ba dikgwebo ba naga ya Aforika Borwa mo makaleng a farologaneng dikgwebo tšhono ya go kopana le badirikabona ba naga ya Spain gore ba kgone go dira gore tirisanommogo ya bona mo kgwebisanong le mo dipeeletsong mo maphateng saense le boitshimololedi bobetli le setso metshameko le thuto nne e tseneletseng.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Leeto leno le kgarameleditse kwa pele naga ya rona mo dipeeletsong mo kgodisong ya ikonomi.

src_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.
tgt_text: Dipuisano mo go Direng gore Ethiopia le ya Tigray di Fitlhelele Kutlwano.

src_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
tgt_text: Mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, go ya ka maikarabelo yona mo go Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika, go ne ga tshwarelwa dipuisano tsa go diga matshwafo maphata otlhe a neng sa tlhole utlwana kwa kgaolong ya Ethiopia le ya Tigray, go tloga ka la bo 25 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Diphalane.

src_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..
Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tseno di ne di etilwe pele ke Moporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Nigeria bong Olusegun Obasanjo, Moporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta mmogo le Motlatsamoporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Aforika Borwa Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.

src_text: South Africa – Spain relations.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhagisitse kemonokeng ya yona mo dipuisanong tseno tsa go tlisa kagiso e tla nnelang ruri, fela jaaka go tshwanetse go ya ka maitlhomo pholisi ya Aforika Borwa ya tirisanommogo le dinaga tsa boditšhaba ya go dira gore mo kontinenteng go se tlhole go nna le dithulano     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.
tgt_text: Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la go Tlhabolola Dikgwebopotlana tse di Golaganeng (NISED).

src_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la NISED gore le tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.
tgt_text: Leano la ntlha la Kgodiso ya Boitshimololedikgwebo ba Dikgwebopotlaka (ISPESE) le ne la simololwa go tsenngwa tirisong ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.
tgt_text: ISPESE eo mo legatong la yona go tseneng NISED dira gore Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa ngwaga wa 1995 se se buang ka Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la go Aga le go Tlhabolola Dikgwebopotlana ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa le tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.
tgt_text: Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la NISED le tlhagisa maano a golagantsweng go gagamatsa le go ema nokeng batho ba ba itshimololelang dikgwebopotlana le tse dikgolonyana.

src_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro le le tsamaisiwang ka tshwanelo go dira gore botlhe ba ba nang le seabe mo maphateng otlhe a botlhokwa ba tsamaise tiro ka tshwanelo..     Monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Moranang Kabinete ne ya dumela gore go ka phasaladiwa sekwalwa sa ntlha se se santseng se tlhoka gore se sekasekwe sa NISED gore baagi ba dire ditshwaelo ka ga sona.

Go tswa mo ditshwaelong tse dintsi tseno leano leno le ne la tokafadiwa ka ditshwaelo go tswa mo baaging mmogo le go tswa mo Lekgotleng la Naga la Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi le Ditiro (NEDLAC), leno ke lekgotla le mo go lona go nang le bagwebi, mekgatlho ya baagi, ya badiri, batlhankedi ba diyunibesiti mmogo le ba puso mo maitlhomo leng go samagana le matsapa a leng teng mo ikonoming, mo ditirong le mo go tokafatseng maemo naga tobaneng le ona mothale ona oo.

src_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe se se Buang ka Pholisi ya Ditirelo tsa go Thusa Baagi ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe se se Buang ka Pholisi ya Ditirelo tsa go Thusa Baagi ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

src_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa seno se dira gore Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela se se buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi mmogo le Tumelano ya Mokgatlho wa Dinagakopano (UN) e buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi di tsenngwe tirisong (UNCPRD).

src_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno eletsa Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago gore le kgone go abela ka tshwanelo ditirelo tsa lona mo bathong ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi mmogo le mo ba malapa batho bano tlhagisa ka fao maemo sa letleng ka teng le ka fao tswelelang go kganela bathong ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi go ka nna le seabe mo ditirong tse di botlhokwa mo setšhabeng, mmogo le go dira gore ba se nne le seabe mo ditirong tsa go thusa baagi le tsa go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.

src_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tlhagisa dikakanyo tse di ka dirisiwang mo go tlhomeng maemo leitlho go dira bonnete jwa gore dikgato tse di tsewang go tokafatsa maemo di diragadiwa jaaka go tshwanetse mo mafapheng a matshwanedi.

src_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di saenetseng UNCPRD mmogo le Lekwalo la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho tse di Buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika..     Kopano ya Setlhopha sa Baemedi ba Maphata Puso ka fa Nageng e Buang ka Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (IPCC).

src_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.
tgt_text: Ka Seetebosigo 2023 Mokgatlho wa IPCC tla tshwara kopano ya bona ya bosupa e ka ga go sekaseka tiro ya yona.

src_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.
tgt_text: IPCC – mo go yona go nang le baemedi ba le 195-ba leng batlhankedi ba puso mo mokgatlhong wa UN – ke bona ba ba rweleng maikarabelo go sekaseka tiro e setseng dirilwe mo mererong ya saense, botegeniki le mo go ya kitso ya merero ya go tlhokomela baagi le ikonomi, mme maitlhomo kopano eno ke go eletsa batho ba ba tsayang ditshweetso gore ba itse gore ke eng se se tlholang phetogo ya maemo loapi, se se amang le seo se ka diriwang go samagana le yona.
Mo kopanong eno e tla tshwarwang ka 2023, go solofetswe gore IPCC tla tlhopha motho yo mongwe yo tla okamang maemo monnasetulo.

src_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.
tgt_text: Kabinete ya rona setse neseditse pula leina la ga Moporofesara Debra Roberts go tswa kwa Yunibesiting ya KwaZulu-Natal gore nne ene yo okamang maemo ano.

src_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.
tgt_text: Moporofesara Roberts diragaditse tiro ya IPCC sentle mo go buleng baagi matlho ka fa kontinenteng ya Aforika.

src_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Ga jaana moporofesara yo ke tokololo ya Mokgatlho wa IPCC.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Fa ka bo tlhophiwa tla nna ene mosadi wa ntlhantlha bile gape tla nna motho wa ntlhantlha go tswa mo Aforika yo okamang maemo ano.

src_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).
tgt_text: Go tlhophiweng ga gagwe go tla bontsha setšhaba tiro ntle e diriwang ke basadi mo kontinenteng ya Aforika     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.
tgt_text: Letsholo la Ngwaga wa 2022 la go Lwela Ditshwanelo tsa Basadi la Matsatsi le.

src_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla keteka mmogo le lefatshe Letsholo la go Lwela Ditshwanelo tsa Basadi la Matsatsi le 16 la go Ema Kgatlhanong le GBV, le le tla simololwang go ketekiwa go tloga ka la bo 25 Ngwanaitseele mo go tla bong go ketekiwa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Fedisa Tirisodikgoka mo Basading, mme le tla garela ka la bo 10 Sedimonthole, fa go tla bo go ketekiwa Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.

src_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula molaetsamogolo wa monongwaga o reng "Go nna le Ditshwanelo mo Mererong ya go Thusa Baagi le Ikonomi go dira gore basadi ba kgone go ikemela kgatlhanong le ditiragalo tsa go bogisa le go bolaya basadi: Go Kopana, Go Dirisana Mmogo le go Nna le Ditumelano".

src_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.
tgt_text: Monongwaga ka nako ya go keteka Letsholo la go Lwela Ditshwanelo tsa Basadi la Matsatsi le 16 la go Ema Kgatlhanong le Tirisodikgoka mo Basading le mo Baneng, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tsepamisa mogopolo wa yona mo go buleng baagi matlho ka ntlha ya go tsenya tirisong Leano la Naga la Togamaano mo Mererong (NSP) ya GBVF.

src_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo leano ke go dira gore go nne le pholisi le leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng ka thulaganyo le nngwe gore re kgone go matlakafatsa dikgato tsa go tsibogela bothata jono jwa GBVF re le puso bile re le naga yotlhe..     Kgwedi ya Bosetšhaba ya Temososetšhaba ka ga Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi (DRAM) mmogo le Letsatsi la Naga la go Keteka Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi.

src_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le kakanyo ya go keteka DRAM le Letsatsi la Naga la go Keteka Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi mmogo le molaetsamogolo wa kakanyo eno, mo go tla ketikiwang go tloga ka la bo 3 Ngwanaitseele go fitlha ka la bo 3 Sedimonthole.

src_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.
tgt_text: Molaetsamogolo wa teng re: “Go Matlafatsa Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi ka go ba tlamela ka didirisiwa tse ba di tlhokang, ka go ba ema nokeng le ka go dira gore ditikologo tse ba leng mo go tsona nne tse di babalesegileng”..     Molaetsamogolo ono gatelela botlhokwa jwa go fedisa dilo tsotlhe tse di kgoreletsang batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi.

src_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.
tgt_text: Dilo tseno di tsenyeletsa gape le didirisiwa tse ba di tlhokang, ka go ba ema nokeng le ka go dira gore ditikologo tse ba leng mo go tsona nne tse di babalesegileng mo go bona, mmogo le go amogela gore ga se batho botlhe ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi ba ka ba supang gonne ba bangwe ga ba bonagale.

src_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.
tgt_text: Mekete eno e tla ketekiwang kgwedi yotlhe tla bula baagi matlho mmogo le go ba bontsha kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe ka fa nageng mo go netefatseng gore ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi, jaaka go tlhalosiwa mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.
tgt_text: Mekete eno tla totobatsa gape le dilo tse go santseng go tlhokwa gore go samaganwe natso tse batho ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi ba santseng ba itemogela tsona kwa mafelong ao ba dirang kwa go ona     Melaetsa.

src_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go Akgola    Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Sekolo sa Edendale Technical Secondary School sa kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal jaaka se fentse Sejana sa Metshameko ya Kgwele ya Dinao mo Dikolong sa CAF.

src_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso      Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Rre Jeremy Mansfield (59), modiredi yo neng tumile yo leng kgale direla kgaso mo thelebišeneng le mo seyalemoweng yo tiro ya gagwe e dirileng bontle tota, yo gapileng dikabo di le dintsinyana.Mme Nelisiwe Magubane (56), yo neng le Mokaedikakaretso wa Lefapha la Eneji (le ga jaanong leng Lefapha la Metswedi ya Dimenerale le Eneji (DMRE)) ne tlotliwa tota fa go tla mo mererong ya intaseteri ya metlakase     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang     Mogeneralemogolo wa Sepodisi Siphosihle Thumy Nkosi – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa Naga sa Dipatlisiso tsa Melato Megolo ya Botlhokotsebe (DPCI)     Moperikatiri Nicholaas Jacobus Gerber – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa DPCI mo Porofenseng ya Mpumalanga     Moperikatiri Gopaul Govender – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa DPCI mo Porofenseng ya Limpopo     Moperikatiri Stephen Molefi Mabuela – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa DPCI mo Porofenseng ya Kapa Bokone.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Leano la go Beeletsa mo Phetogong ya Motlakase o sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo (JET-IP).

src_text: Just Energy Transition Investment Plan (JET-IP).
tgt_text: Leano la go Beeletsa mo Phetogong ya Motlakase o sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo la naga ya Aforika Borwa le akgotswe go utlwagala kwa Kopanong ya bo 27 ya Khonferense ya Dinagakopano e ka ga Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (COP27) e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sharm El-Sheikh, kwa Egepeta go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 18 Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: South Africa’s JET-IP received widespread acclaim at the 27th session of the United Nations (UN) Climate Change Conference of the Parties (COP27) being held in Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt from 6 to 18 November.

tgt_text: Leano leno la rona le legolo le le akgotsweng ke Badirisanimmogo ba Rona ba Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba – United Kingdom, United States, Germany, France, European Union mmogo le badirisanimmogo ba bangwe mo mererong ya loago – le tlhalosa ka tlhamalalo dikgato tsa rona tsa go tswa mo tirisong ya motlakase wa ga jaana go tsena mo go oo sa kgotlheleng tikologo.

src_text: The bold plan that was endorsed by the International Partners Group –  the United Kingdom, United States, Germany, France, European Union and other social partners – outlines our transition to low carbon economy.
tgt_text: Leano leno le na gape le seabe le mo matsapeng a tswewang mo lefatsheng go lwantshana le phetogo ya loapi mmogo le mo maanong tlhabololo go samaganweng le ona ga jaana le mo isagong.

src_text: It also contributes to global efforts to ensure climate resilience and sustainable development for current and future generations.
tgt_text: Leano leno, le le tlotlomaditsweng tota ka gore le tlisa diphetogo tse dintšhwa, le bona kemonokeng ya matlole go tswa mo dinaga tse di gatetseng pele gore di kgone go diragatsa maikano tsona go lwantshana le phetogo ya maemo loapi.

src_text: Hailed as ground-breaking new model for tackling climate change, the JET-IP is based on the financial responsibility of developed countries to assist developing nations meet their climate change commitments.
tgt_text: Leano leno le nopola dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tse go tshwanetsweng go beelediwang mo go tsona mo tlhagisong ya motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo, mo tlhagisong ya dijanaga tse di dirisang motlakase le leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo leng tse di tla dirisiwang go bulela dikgato tsa go fetola metlakase re dirisang go simolola go dirisa e sa kgotlheleng tikologo..     Khonferense ya Makoko a Tshegetsang Ditharabololo tsa Maemo Phetogo ya Loapi.

src_text: It identifies investment priorities in the areas of clean energy, electric vehicles and green hydrogen, to pave the way for sustainable and fair transition towards cleaner energy..
tgt_text: Kabinete eme nokeng boikuelo jo bo dirilweng kwa go COP27 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sharm El-Sheikh, kwa Egepeta go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 18 Ngwanaitseele 2022 jo bo reng dinaga di tshwanetse go tswelela go diragatsa dintlha tse go ipeetsweng tsona mo Tumelanong e Utlwanetsweng ke Dinaga kwa Teropong ya Paris e reng go tshwanetswe go samaganwe le go fokodiwa ga mogote mo lefatsheng ka ditekeri selešiase di le.

src_text: Climate Change Conference of the Parties .

Cabinet supported calls at the COP27 being held in Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt from 6 to 18 November 2022 for countries to remain on track to meet the Paris Agreement goal of limiting the global temperature rise to.
tgt_text: Kemonokeng ya rona mo ntlheng ya go fokodiwa ga mogote mo lefatsheng ka ditekeri selešiase di le.

src_text: 5 degrees Celsius.
tgt_text: 5 ke selo se se botlhokwa thata mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa jaaka re le karolo ya kontinenteng ya Aforika bile gape re le naga e santseng tlhabologa tlhabologo ya yona mo go thuseng baagi le ikonomi di anngwang tota ke ditlamorago tsa phetogo ya maemo loapi..     Kabinete dumelane le boikuelo jo bo dirilweng ke dinaga tsa Aforika jwa gore dinaga tse di gatetseng pele di tshwanetse go diragatsa lefoko la bona la go solofetsa gore le tla ema nokeng dinaga tse di santseng di iketetsa jaaka di solofeditse mo ditokomaneng ka bobedi ba tsona leng Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Dinagakopano (UN) mo Mererong ya go Fetola Maemo Loapi mmogo le ya Tumelanong e Utlwanetsweng ke Dinaga kwa Teropong ya Paris.

src_text: Our support for the.
tgt_text: Tseno di tsenyeletsa gape le boikuelo ja gore dinaga tse di gatetseng pele tshwanetse go nna tsna tse di gogang kwa pele dikgato tsa go fokotsa kuelelo ya kgotlhelo ya tikologo mmogo le go tlamela ka matlole dinaga tse di santseng di iketetsa gore le tsona di kgone go tsaya dikgato go samagana le phetogo ya maemo loapi..     Go Lwantshana le Bonweenwee.

src_text: 5 degree Celsius target is of utmost importance to South Africa as an African and developing country that is highly vulnerable to environmental, social and economic effects of climate change..
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke seo se dirilweng mo malobeng leng go tshwara batho ba ba amegang mo ditiragalong tsa go goga puso ka nko mmogo le go thopa dithoto tsa bona.

src_text: Cabinet also endorsed the Africa group position to call on developed countries to honour their pledges and commitments made under both the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change and its Paris Agreement.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tseno ke sesupo sa gore tiro e dirilweng ke Khomišene ya Diphuruphutso tse di Mabapi le go Goga Puso ka Nko, go Dira Bonweenwee le Bokhukhuntshwane mo Pusong mmogo le mo Ditheong tsa Puso di simolola go nna le dipoelo..     Batho ba ba dirang bonweenwee mmogo le bao ba dirang gore bana ba rona ba nne le bokamoso jo bo letobo ga ba batlege mo setšhabeng sa rona.

src_text: These include call for developed countries to take the lead on reducing emissions and providing developing countries with financial resources for their own climate action..  Fight against corruption.
tgt_text: Puso itomile sesino fa go tla mo go samaganeng le bonweenwee ka tsela e kgopo e sa tshabeng sepe bile sa tsee letlhakore..     Kabinete ikuela mo baaging gore ba tshwarise batho botlhe ba ba dirang ditiro tsa bonweenwee kwa ditheong tsa molao kgotsa ka go loma tsebe ba Mogala wa Tshoganyetso leng Mogala wa Naga wa Twantsho ya Bonweenwee: 0800 701.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the recent arrests and freezing of assets of individuals allegedly linked to State Capture.
tgt_text: Batho ba ba lomang mogala ono tsebe ba ka nne ba kopa go nna botlhokaina.

src_text: These developments are testament that the work of the Judicial Commission of Inquiry into Allegations of State Capture, Corruption and Fraud in the Public Sector including Organs of State is now bearing fruit..
tgt_text: Leeto la Semmuso la Moporesitente kwa Nageng ya Kenya.

src_text: Corrupt people and those who steal the future of our children have no place in our society.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Leeto la Semmuso la Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa, kwa Nageng ya Kenya go latela gore lalediwe ke Moporesitente ka ene bong Ngaka William Ruto.

src_text: Government is committed to dealing harshly with all acts of corruption, without fear, favour or prejudice..
tgt_text: Mo leetong leo go atlhaatlhilwe dilo di tshwana le Foramo ya Kgwebisano moo go neng go buiwa ka go gwebisana le go beeletsa mo dinageng ka bobedi leng ya Kenya le ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Cabinet urges citizens to report all acts of corruption to law-enforcement agencies or call the National Anti-Corruption Hotline: 0800 701.
tgt_text: Mo leetong leno go ne ga saeniwa ditumelano tsa go dirisana mo ditirelong tsa tlhokomelo ya batshwariwa, tsa go agela baagi magae, tsa didirisiwa tsa dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le mo ditirelong tsa go tlhatlhelela badiredi ba Sekolo sa Naga sa Katiso le Tlhatlhelelo ya Badiredipuso (NSG).

src_text: Callers may choose to remain anonymous.
tgt_text: Baeteledipele bano bobedi jwa bona bo ne jwa atlhaatlhaa merero e ka ga ditumelano tsa tirisanommogo ya dipuso tse di farologaneng, maemo ikonomi kgaolo le kontinente.

src_text: Kenya State Visit.
tgt_text: Naga ya Kenya ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di gwebisanang go utlwagala tota le naga ya Aforika Borwa fa go tla mo Dinaga tse di Dirisanang Mmogo tse di kwa Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC), mme seno se raya gore Aforika Borwa ke yona e rekisetsang Kenya ditlhagisiwa tse dintsi mo kontinenteng ya rona Naga ya Aforika Borwa romela ditlha.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful State Visit to Kenya by President Cyril Ramaphosa, at the invitation of his Kenyan counterpart, Dr William Ruto.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa rekiseditse naga ya Kenya ditlhagisiwa di ka dira boleng jwa go feta R6-bilione mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: The visit included Business Forum focusing on trade and investment between Kenya and South Africa.

The visit also resulted in the signing of instruments on cooperation in correctional services, human settlements, audio-visual co-production, and on building the capacity of the State with the National School of Government.
tgt_text: Dipula tse di Bogale.

src_text: The two leaders discussed multilateral, economic, regional and continental issues.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging gore ba ntshe matlho dinameng mo dipuleng tse di bogale, segolobogolo mo dipuleng tse di nang ka magadima.

src_text: Kenya is South Africa’s largest trading partner outside the Southern African Development Community (SADC) region, making South Africa the biggest seller of goods to Kenya on the continent.
tgt_text: Puso mmogo le Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa Tirelo ya Maemo Loapi bobedi ba tla tswelela go sedimosetsa baagi ka maemo ga jaana loapi mmogo le ka ponelopele ya maemo ano.

src_text: South Africa exported over R6-billion worth of goods to Kenya in.
tgt_text: Baagi ba elediwa gore ba se tsamaele gaufi le mo metsi mantsi sianang ka lobelo, ba se thumele mo go ona kgotsa ba se kgabaganye mo metsing ano ka dijanaga tsa bona se ke wa leka go kgabaganya mo metsi tletseng gonne ka go gogola.
Dira bonnete jwa gore ka gale bana ba gago ba bolokesegile bile mo ba tsamayang go babalesegile..     Samiti ya Baeteledipele ba Dinaga di le Someamabedi (G20).

src_text: Severe weather conditions.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne tsenetse Samiti ya bo 17 ya G20 kwa Bali kwa nageng ya Indonesia go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 16 Ngwanaitseele 2022 mo go yona baeteledipele mo lefatsheng ba neng ba kopane teng go bontshana ditharabololo mabapi le dikgwetlho tse dikgolo tse dintsi tse lefatshe ka bophara le tobaneng le tsona      Ditharabololo tse di solofelwang go fitlhelelwa di tsenyeletsa tse di ka ga tirisanommogo ya dinaga tse di farologaneng mo go tsosoloseng ikonomi ya lefatshe, go dira gore ditheo tsa matlole mo lefatsheng di boele sekeng, go dira gore kgolo e sa tekatekeng tswelele go nna teng sebaka se se telele mmogo le go dira gore tsamaiso ya ikonomi mo lefatsheng gagamadiwe.

src_text: Cabinet called on the public to exercise caution during unfavourable weather conditions, particularly thunderstorms.
tgt_text: Molaetsamogolo wa samiti eno ya G20 ya Moporesitente wa Indonesia re: “Re Thusana go Tsosolosana, Re Tsosolosana Re na le Maatla le go Feta”.

src_text: Government and the South African Weather Service will continue to provide information on severe weather based on current observations and predictions.
tgt_text: Jaaka le karolo ya tiro ya naga ya rona, Moporesitente Ramaphosa nnile le seabe mo dikopanong tse di neng di bua ka merero ya boitekanelo, go se felelwe ke dijo le motlakase mmogo le go tshwara le dikopano tse dingwe gape tsa dinaga di le pedi le dinaga tse di botlhokwa tseo re gwebisanang le tsona..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke ditharabololo tse di atlhatlhilweng kwa samiting eno, tseo di tsamaisanang le dintlha tse di botlhokwa mo nageng ya rona leng go fokotsa tshokolo, botlhokatiro le go se lekane re se meno.

src_text: People are advised not to walk, swim or drive through fast-moving flood water.
tgt_text: Katiso le Tlhatlhelelo ya Bokgoni.

src_text: Do not try to cross flooded area because you could be swept away by the strong currents.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke dikgato tsa semmuso tsa go thankgolola laboratori kgolo ya dithuto tsa 4IR kwa Kholejeng ya Katiso le Thuto ya Ditiro tsa Diatla le tsa Setegenik (di-TVET) ya Goldfields kwa Welkom, mo porofenseng ya Foreistata ka Labone wa la bo 10 Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: Always ensure that your children are safe and they are able to travel safely.
tgt_text: Seno se thusa gore go nne le katiso le tlhatlhelelo ya bogoni, boitlhamedi le boitshimololedikgwebo, re le naga re ka kgona go abelana ka ditharabololo tse dintšhwa, tse di botoka le tse di sa diegeng go rarabolola dikgwetlho tse re tobaneng natso tsa tshokolo, go se lekane re se meno mmogo le tsa go tlhoka ditiro     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
Dipegelo tsa Tiro e Dirilweng mo Kotareng ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga.

src_text: Group of Twenty (G20) Leaders’ Summit.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Dipegelo tsa Tiro e Dirilweng mo Kotareng ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga go simolola ka la bo 01 Moranang 2022 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Lwetse.

src_text: President Ramaphosa participated in the 17th G20 Leaders’ Summit held in Bali in the Republic of Indonesia from 15 to 16 November 2022, which brought together world leaders in collective effort to find solutions to wide range of global challenges.
tgt_text: Mo dipegelong tseno ga go buiwe fela ka tiro e dirilweng mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga, dipegelo tseno di bua gape le ka tshekatsheko ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa mo bogareng jwa paka ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro mo Pakeng ya Ngwaga wa 2019-. .

src_text: The envisaged solutions include increasing multilateral cooperation for the recovery of the global economy, to bring stability to the global financial system, to promote long-term sustainable growth and to strengthen global economic governance.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno di rulagantswe go ya ka ditlhopha di le tlhano  setlhopha sa Merero ya Phimolakeledi, Thibelobosenyi le Pabalesego; (ii) setlhopha sa Makala Merero ya Ikonomi, Dipeeletso, Ditiro le Kago ya Mafaratlhatlha; (iii) setlhopha sa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi, Setšhaba le Katiso ya Batho; (iv) setlhopha sa Ditheo tsa Puso, Batlhankedi ba Puso le Tlhatlhelelo ya Ditheo tsa Naga, mmogo le  setlhopha sa Tirisanommogo le Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le go Gwebisana le go Babalelana..     Dipegelo tseno di tlhalosa ka botlalo dintlha tse di botlhokwa go tswa mo dipeelong di le supa tse di botlhokwa tse puso ipeetseng tsona mme re dirisa tshedimosetso e gatisitsweng mo dipegelong tsa mafapha a farologaneng, dipalopalo go tswa mo dipegelong tsa Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) mmogo le mo dipegelong tsa ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane.

src_text: The theme of the summit held under the G20 Presidency of Indonesia was: “Recover Together, Recover Stronger”.
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso eno a sekasekiwa go netefatsa boammaruri jwa yona go ya ka Leano la Tlhabololo la Bosetšhaba: Ponelopele ya.

src_text: As part of our nation’s engagement, President Ramaphosa participated in the working sessions on health, food and energy security as well as held several bilateral meetings with key trade partners..
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tiro ntle go begilweng ka yona mo dikarolong dingwe mo go bonagalang gore go diragaditswe bontle go feta le ka fao go neng go lebeletswe.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the deliberations at the summit, which underpin our own national priorities of reducing poverty, unemployment and inequality.
tgt_text: Le fa go le jalo, Kabinete tshwenngwa ke dikarolo dingwe moo go gogwang maoto mo dipegelong tseno.

src_text: Skills Development and Training.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula ditharabololo tse di tsitshintsweng tse di tla tleng di tsenngwa tirisong go dira gore tiro e saletseng kwa morago potlakisiwe..     Lefapha la Tiromaano,Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo la nna le dipuisano le bobegakgang go tlhalosa dipegelo tseno ka botlalo..     Pholisi ya Dikgato tsa go Thibela Thekiso ya Dikgorokgoro go Dira gore Ikonomi le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba di se Tlhole di Senyetswa.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the official launch of 4IR micro-laboratory at the Goldfields Technical and Vocational Education and Training College in Welkom, Free State on Thursday, 10 November.
tgt_text: 1    Kabinete ne ya sekaseka le go nesetswa pula dikgato di le dintsinyana tsa go thibela gore ikonomi le mafaratlhatlha setšhaba di se tlhole di senyetswa ka go dira gore dikgorokgoro le ditshipi tse di sa tlholeng di dirisiwa di se tlhole di rekisiwa.. 2    Seno se dirilwe morago ga gore go phasaladiwe lekwalo la melao ya puso ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 go kopa baagi go ntsha se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga lona le le bediwang “Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Melao e Tshitshinngwang go Thibela Ditiro tsa go Gweba ka Ditshipi tse di Botlhokwa le tse di Seng Botlhokwa, Ditshipi le Masenke Dikgerekgere le Dikorokoro le go Dira gore Thekiso ya Tsona Tsmaisane le Molao mme Maitlhomo le go Thibela Ditiragalo tsaTshenyetso ya Ikonomi le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba”, mme lona le golotswe ke Tona ya Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Intaseteri le Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo; mme le ditshwaelo tse dintsintsi tsa baagi re setse le tsona re di amogetse.. 3    Dintlha ka botlalo tse di ka ga dikgato tse jaanong di tla tsewang di tla rulaganyediwa gore di phasaladiwe mo Lekwalong la Semmuso le le Gatisang Melao ya Puso mme le tla gatisiwa ke Kantoro e jarileng maikarabelo ano mme GCIS yona tla re ka gangwe fela fa tiro ya molao sena go garela ya dira bonnete jwa gore gasa mo bobegakganyeng dikgato ka botlalo ka ntlha eno.. 4    Aforika Borwa tla tšhotlha kgang eno gape le Dinaga tsa Borwa tse di Santseng di Tlhabologa, Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika mmogo le Lekala la Tlhatlhobo ya Dithoto kwa Melelwaneng maitlhomo le go dira bonnete jwa gore re dikadikana le bosenyi jono mo kgaolong ya rona     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: This contributes towards skills development, innovation and entrepreneurship, as the country can provide new, better and faster solutions to our challenges of poverty, inequality and unemployment  Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Semphosiamo ya Aforika Borwa ya go Aga Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba a tla Nnelang Ruri (SIDSSA).

src_text: Biannual performance reports.
tgt_text: Ba Mafaratlhatlha Aforika Borwa, mmogo le ba GIZ leng setheo sa go aga mafaratlhatlha sa naga ya German, ba tla tshwara SIDSSA ya boraro kwa Motse Kapa kwa Century City go tloga ka la bo 28 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: Cabinet approved the biannual performance progress reports for the period 1 April 2022 to 30 September.
tgt_text: Semphosiamo ya monongwaga tla bua ka leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo jaaka selo se se botlhokwa thata mo go godiseng lekala la rona le maano naga go beeletsa tshwanetseng go tobana le lona.

src_text: In addition to capturing the biannual performance progress, the reports also provide mid-term review of the priorities of the 2019-2024 Medium Term Strategic Framework..
tgt_text: Semphosiamo tla kopanya mo lefelong le le esi batlhankedi ba ba tsayang ditshwetso tse dikgolo, ditheo tsa matlole, tsa thuto kgolwane mmogo le ditheo tsa molao tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: The reports are compiled according to the five clusters namely  Justice, Crime Prevention and Security; (ii) Economic Sectors, Investment, Employment and Infrastructure Development; (iii) Social Protection, Community and Human Development; (iv) Governance, State Capacity and Institutional Development, and  International Cooperation, Trade and Security..
tgt_text: Semphosiamo eno tla neela naga ya rona tšhono ya gore bontshe lefatshe mafelo yona magolo le a sa tlhokeng matlole mantsi maemo a kwa godimo mo lefatsheng go tlhagisa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo.

src_text: The reports provide an analysis of the key indicators of the seven adopted priorities of government using data collected from the departmental reports, statistics from Statistics South Africa and reports from the academia.
tgt_text: Tlhokagalo ya leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo go tshwana le amoniya le leokwane la maaka la difofane a oketsega mo lefatsheng.

src_text: The information is analysed against the National Development Plan: Vision.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi la naga ya Aforika Borwa ga le bolo go dira dipatlisiso ka leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo mme le ne lebeletse thata lephata la dinamelwa tse di sa kgotlheleng tikologo mmogo le go ka dirisa ditshipi tse di welang mo setlhopheng sa ditshipi tsa polatinamo..     Monongwaga kwa tshimologong Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula Leano le Legolo la Lephata la Leokwane la Gase.

Leano leno ke le lengwe la maano mantsi puso go eletsa ditkgato tse pholisi ka di tsayang maitlhomo le go dira gore maphata puso le poraefete mmogo le ditheo tsa rona ba tshwarisane tiro gore re fitlhelele ponelopele ya rona e buang ka lefoko le le lengwe la ka fao re ka solang mosola leokwane la gase mmogo le dithekenoloji tsa lona, jaaka le karolo ya go tlhabolola ikonomi ya naga le go fitlhelela maikano re ipeetseng ona go nna le tikologo e sa kgotlhelweng.

src_text: Cabinet appreciated the remarkable progress reported in some areas that showed performance that exceeded the set-out targets.
tgt_text: Ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa leokwane la gase le dirisiwa ka bontsi mo lekaleng la phepafatso ya dikhemikhale le leokwane, le fa go le jalo fa le tlhagisiwa le tlhagisiwa go sa lebelelwa gore le dirisiwe jaaka sedirisiwa sa motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo mme le dirisiwa mo dilong tse di jaaka malatlha le gase ya tlhago     Go Thapiwa     Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: However, it expressed concern at the slow progress reflected in some of the reports.
tgt_text: Mme Phindile Baleni thapilwe go okama maemo Mokaedikakaretso (DG) kwa Kantorong ya Moporesitente le go nna Mokwaledi wa Kabinete (Konteraka ya gagwe otlolositswe ka dingwaga di le tlhano)..     Ngaka Philemon Mphathi Mjwara thapilwe go okama maemo DG kwa DSI (Konteraka ya gagwe otlolositswe ka ngwaga le mongwe)..     Kabinete dumelane le Tona ya DTIC go thapa batho ba ba latelang:.

src_text: Cabinet approved the proposed interventions to be implemented to fast-track areas that showed slow progress..
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Peo ya Maemo Boleng     Ngaka Sandile Bethuel Malinga (Monnasetulo)     Rre Tumisang Tsehlo     Ngaka Rudzani Nemutudi     Mme Deidré Penfold     Ngaka Nandipha Madibaf.

src_text: The Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation will soon convene roundtable discussion with the media to unpack these reports..  Policy measures to restrict trade in scrap metal to limit damage to public infrastructure and the economy.
tgt_text: Mme Gloria Mngunig.

src_text: 1 Cabinet considered and approved the comprehensive package of measures to address the damage to public infrastructure and the economy by restricting trade of waste scrap and semi processed metals.. 2 This follows the gazetting on 5 August 2022 for public comment of the “Draft Policy Proposals on Measures to Restrict and Regulate Trade in Ferrous and Non-Ferrous Metals Waste, Scrap and Semi-Finished Ferrous and Non-Ferrous Metal Products to Limit Damage to Infrastructure and the Economy”, by the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Competition; and consideration of the extensive public comments received.. 3  Details of the measures to be implemented will now be processed for publication in the Government Gazette by the relevant Ministries and detailed media release containing details of the measures will be released by the GCIS as soon as the necessary legal work has been finalised.. 4  South Africa will also engage with the SADC, African Union and the Southern African Customs Union to ensure coordinated approach to fight this crime collectively as region  Upcoming event.
tgt_text: Ngaka Ron Josiash.

src_text: Sustainable Infrastructure Development Symposium South Africa (SIDSSA).
tgt_text: Ngaka Mukondeleli Grace Kanakana-Katumba.

src_text: Infrastructure South Africa, in partnership with GIZ German development agency, will host its third SIDSSA in Cape Town Century City from 28 to 30 November.
tgt_text: Boto ya Lekgotla la go Sekela Dikgetse tsa Ditlamo     Moatlhodi Dennis Davis (Monnasetulo)     Mme Minah Tong-Mongalo (Motlatsamonnasetulo)c.    Mme Daiane Terblanche     Mme Hlaleleni Kathleen Dlepue.

src_text: This year’s symposium will focus on green hydrogen as an important growth sector in the country’s investment strategy.
tgt_text: Moporofesara Clement Marumoagaef.

src_text: The symposium will bring together decision-makers, financial institutions, academics and international authorities.
tgt_text: Rre Joshua Sesha Kadishg.

src_text: The event will afford the country the opportunity to showcase some of the large and low-cost world-class green hydrogen production hubs.
tgt_text: Rre Richard Bradstreet     Rre Fulufhedzani Shane Mudzungai.

src_text: The demand for green hydrogen-based products such as ammonia and synthetic jet fuels is rising.
tgt_text: Mme Nomagcisa Cawej.

src_text: The Department of Science and Innovation (DSI) in South Africa has been researching green hydrogen with focus on green mobility and the use of platinum group metals..
tgt_text: Rre Brian Jenningsk.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Hydrogen Society Roadmap earlier this year.
tgt_text: Ngaka Alli Chicktay.

src_text: The roadmap is one of government’s strategies and policy direction aimed at bringing together variety of public and private stakeholders and institutions around common vision on how to use and deploy hydrogen and hydrogen-related technologies, as part of the country’s economic development and greening objectives.
tgt_text: Ngaka Mashilo Boloka: Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo yo tshwereng marapo nakwana mo Botong ya Difilimi le Diphasalatso thapilwe gape le mo Botong ya ditokololo di le thataro ya Mogala wa Tshoganyetso wa Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe (INHOPE).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS).

src_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey (QLFS).
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dipalopalo tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS) tse di dirilweng ke ba Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa 2022, mme tsona di bontsha gore batho ba le 204 000 ba iponetse ditiro mo kotareng ya bobedi le ya boraro ya ngwaga wa.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the results of Statistics South Africa’s QLFS for the third quarter of 2022, which indicated that 204 000 jobs were gained between the second and third quarters of..
The QLFS also revealed that the total number of persons employed in the third quarter of 2022 was 15,8 million.
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tseno gape di bontsha gore palo ya batho botlhe ba ba iponetseng ditiro mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa 2022 ne tsamaela mo go ba le dimilione di le 15,. .

src_text: This means that the official unemployment rate decreased by 1,0 percentage point from 33,9% in the second quarter to 32,9% in the third quarter of.
tgt_text: Seno se raya gore palo ya semmuso ya batho ba ba senang ditiro wetse kwa tlase ka phesente le nngwe go tloga mo go ba ba ka dirang diphesente di le 33,9% mo kotareng ya bobedi mme ga jaanong mo go di le 32,9% mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa.

src_text: The unemployment rate according to the expanded definition of unemployment also decreased by 1,0 percentage point to 43,1% in the third quarter of 2022 compared to the second quarter of.
tgt_text: Go ya gape le ka tlhaoloso ya dipalo tsotlhe tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro palo ya batho ba ba senang ditiro fokotsegile gape le ka phesente le nngwe mme jaanong mo go diphesente di le 43,1% mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa 2022 mme botoka fa bapisiwa le eo botlhokatiro bo neng bo le mo go bona mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa.

src_text: While this increase may be viewed as drop in the ocean, it does show that the strategies to grow employment are starting to yield positive results.
tgt_text: Le fa tota go tokafala ga maemo ano go bonagala kete ga go gokalo go go fetogileng, se sno se bonagalang ke gore maano go leka go oketsa dipalo tsa batho ba ba nang le ditiro setse simolotse go re tswela molemo..  Ditiro tse re nnileng le tsona bontsi jwa tsona bo tlhageletse mo lephateng la tlhagisong ya dikuno (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 123 000), mme lona la latelwa ke la kgwebisano (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 82 000), la dikoterana tsa kago (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 46 000), la dipalangwa (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 33 000),mmogo le mo lephateng la ditiro tsa mo metseng le la tlhokomelo ya baagi (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 27 000).

src_text: The largest jobs gain were recorded in manufacturing (123 000), followed by trade (82 000), construction (46 000), transport (33 000), and community and social services (27 000).
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging gore ba se tšhe legano fa go tla mo kemonokeng ya Leano la Itharabologelo le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP) go dira bonnete jwa gore re le naga ga re tšhwe mafoko fa go tla mo go godiseng ikonomi le mo go tlholeng ditiro tse di tlhokagala..  Kabinete itse sentle gore naga ya rona santse saletse morago mo dilong di le dintsi bogolosegolo mo tirong ya go rarabolola bothata jwa botlhokatiro..  Leeto la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga ya United Kingdom kwa Great Britain le kwa Northern Ireland (UK).

src_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to continue to rally behind the country’s Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) to ensure that as country we keep the momentum of growing the economy and creating much-needed jobs..
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke Leeto la maemo a kwa godimo la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga ya UK go simolola ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 23 Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: Cabinet acknowledges that the country has long way to go and more work needs to be done to address the challenge of unemployment in the country.
tgt_text: Motlotlegi Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ke ene wa ntlhantlha mo lefatsheng jaaka tlhogo ya puso go amogelwa ke Bogosi jwa naga ya Britain fa sale bo okanngwa ke Motlotlegi Kgosi Charles III, fa sale namela setilo sa bogosi ka kgwedi ya Lwetse.

src_text: State Visit to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UK).
Cabinet welcomed the historic Presidential State Visit to the UK that took place from   22 to 23 November.
tgt_text: Leeto la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga ya Bogosi ke tlotla e seng kana ka sepe mo nageng jaaka thusa gore botsalano jwa naga eo le jwa UK bo tswelele go gola bile gape seno ke sesupo sa ka fao UK tsayang botsalano jwa yona le naga e rileng jaaka jo bo botlhokwa ka gona.

src_text: His Excellency President Cyril Ramaphosa became the first Head of State to be hosted by the British monarch, His Majesty King Charles III, since his accession to the throne in September Royal State Visit is the highest honour bestowed on country by the UK to further promote bilateral relations and it also symbolises the importance the UK ascribes to its relations with particular country.
tgt_text: Leeto la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga eno leng se se gagamatsang botsalano jo bogolo magareng ga naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya UK, le dirile gore go thankgololwe kgato e tla latelang ya tirisanommogo mo mererong ya mafaratlhatlha magareng ga UK le Aforika Borwa.

src_text: The Presidential State Visit, which marked continuation of the strong bilateral ties between South Africa and the UK, resulted in the launch of the next phase of the UK-South Africa Infrastructure Partnership.
tgt_text: Mo tirisanongmmogo eno Aforika Borwa tla enngwa nokeng mo kgodisong ya mafaratlhatlha ikonomi ya ona mmogo le go dira gore ditlamo tsa naga ya UK di tsenye letsogo mo diporojekeng tsa boleng jwa madi le kana ka £.

src_text: The partnership supports South Africa’s economic growth through major infrastructure developments and offers increased access to UK companies in projects worth up to £.
tgt_text: 37 bilione mo dingwageng di le tharo tse di tlang..  Mosola wa leeto leno ke go godisa kgwebisano le dipeeletso magareng ga dinaga ka bobedi, mmogo le go godisa maraka mo nageng ya Britain Aforika Borwa o rekisetsang ditlhagisiwa tsa yona.

src_text: 37 billion over the next three years.
tgt_text: Mo Foramong ya Beng ba Dikgwebo ba Naga ya UK le ya Aforika Borwa, babeeletsi ba naga ya UK bao ba neng ba dira boikano jwa gore ba tla tswelela go dirisana le naga ya Aforika Borwa ba ne ba bontshiwa ditšhono tse dintsinyana tseo dikgwebo tsa bona di ka beeletsang mo go tsona.

src_text: The visit focused on upgrading trade and investment levels between the two countries, and also on creating more opportunities in British markets for South African goods and commodities.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya UK di saenile gape le Tokomane ya Tirisanommogo mabapi le go Dirisana Mmogo mo Mererong ya Saense le ya Boitlhamedi mmogo le go Dirisana Mmogo le mo Mererong ya Boitekanelo mo go tla tsepamiswang mogopolo mo go direng meento, go abelana ka tshedimosetso ya matshwao bolwetse mmogo le go dirisana le ka merero ya maemo loapi..  Tse dingwe tsa dilo tse di tlhageletseng mo leetong leno ke go totobatsa gore dinaga tseno di tla dirisana mo mafaratlhatlheng, mo dithekenolojing tse di sa kgotlheleng tikologo mmogo le mo metsweding ya motlakase o fetlhiwang ka ditsela tse dintšhwa o sa kgotlheleng tikologo.

src_text: During the UK-SA Business Forum, numerous business opportunities on offer were profiled to UK investors who pledged their continued engagement with South Africa.
tgt_text: Ditšhono tseno tsotlhe di na le bokgoni jwa gore di ka bulela kgwebisano ka fa nageng, dipeeletso mmogo le go oketsa tlholego ya ditiro..  Lefelo la Teropo ya Tshwane la Ikonomi e Itlhophileng e Itshetlegileng mo Dijanageng (TASEZ).

src_text: South Africa and the UK  also signed Memorandums of Understanding on Cooperation in Science and Innovation as well as Health Cooperation that would focus on vaccine manufacturing, genome sequencing and climate change.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa Ford Motor Company of South Africa (FMCSA) tsa go tlhagisa sejanaga sa Ford Ranger, mo re boneng go diriwa dipeeletso tsa matlole le kanaka  8 bilione..  Seno se dirile gore ditlamo tsotlhe di le 10 tsa go aga dikarolo tsa dijanaga tse di leng mo lefelong leno la TASEZ di tsene tirong semmuso ka botlalo.

src_text: Other outcomes from the visit included securing collaboration on infrastructure, clean technology and renewable energy sources.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso tse di dirilweng ke ditlamo tseno tsa go aga dikarolo tsa dijanaga di ne tsa fitlha go  62 bilione mme ga tlhodiwa ditiro di le 1 259 tsa letsatsi le letsatsi tseo di unngwetseng bašwa ba le kanaka 76% le basadi ba le kanaka 32%..  Lefelo la TASEZ le tlhomilwe ka maitlhomo gore nne lefelo le le tlhagisang dijanaga tse di agiwang go dira tiro e rileng mme maitlhomo ne le go tlhola ditiro mmogo le go thusa gore dikgwebopotlana, tse dikgolwane le tse dikgolo di nne le seabe mo ikonoming ya kgaolo eo.

src_text: These opportunities hold the potential to unlock domestic trade, investment and boost job creation.
tgt_text: La ntlha fa sejanaga seno se ne se agiwa maitlhomo ne le go oketsa mafaratlhatlha le bokgoni mo setlamong sa FMCSA ka go dira gore naga ya Aforika Borwa nne nngwe ya mafelo le mararo fela mo lefatsheng a tlhagisang Ford Ranger ntšhwa..  Khonferense e Buang ka Thekenoloji ya Naga le Bokgoni jwa Kamoso.

src_text: Tshwane Automotive Special Economic Zone (TASEZ).
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Khonferense e Buang ka Thekenoloji ya Naga le Bokgoni jwa Kamoso e neng tshwaretswe kwa Umhlanga, KwaZulu-Natal go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 23 Ngwanaitseele 2022, eo maitlhomo yona leng go matlafatsa dikgato tse naga ya rona gatetseng pele mo go tsona mo mererong e buang ka thekenoloji le bokgoni jwa kamoso..  Gareng ga dilo tse dingwe tse dintsi, maitlhomo Khonferense eno e neng tshwerwe ke Lefapha la Ditlhaeletsano le Thekenoloji ya Dijithale (DCDT) ka tirisanommogo le Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) ne le go matlafatsa tirisanommogo mo mererong e buang ka thekenoloji le bokgoni jwa kamoso mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, go dira gore batho ba nne le phisegelo ya go dira ka thekenoloji le bokgoni jwa kamoso mmogo le go tlhotlhomisa ditšhono tsa katiso ya tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni jwa go dirisa didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji tse bašwa ba nang le tsona tse di tlhagisiwang ka ntlha ya Diintaseteri tsa Thekenoloji..  Mo khonferenseng eno go dumelanwe gore puso, dikgwebo, mekgatlho ya baagi, mekgatlho ya lefatshe e samaganang le merero ya tlhabologo mmogo le mekgatlho ya bašwa tla nna bona ba ba isang naga eno pele mo lefatsheng la thekenoloji..  Lefelo le Lentšhwa la kwa Porofenseng ya Limpopo la go Tlhokomela Basadi ba ba Bogisiwang.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the production of the next generation Ford Ranger by Ford Motor Company of South Africa (FMCSA), which saw capital investment of  8 billion.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go bulwa ga Lefelo la go Tlhokomela Basadi ba ba Bogisiwang kwa Bookelong jwa Dilokong mo Motseng wa Dilokong, kwa porofenseng ya Limpopo ka Labobedi, 22 Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: This resulted in all 10 auto component manufacturing companies located in the TASEZ officially entering into full operation.
tgt_text: Lefelo leno la ditirelontsi le ema nokeng basadi ba ba bogisiwang le ba ba sutlhileng leso ka mosobana wa nalete (GBVF) mmogo le bao ba kileng ba betelelwa..  Lefelo leno ke la bo 62 la mafelo mofuta ono a butsweng naga ka bophara mme le go bontsha gore puso diragatsa seo se solofeditseng ka ngwaga wa 2018 kwa Samiting ya Moporesitente e ka ga go Nna Kgatlhanong le GBVF mo solofeditseng gore tla aga mafelo mangwe mantsinyana mothale ono.

src_text: The investment by the component manufacturers amounted to  62 billion and created 1 259 permanent jobs benefiting youth (76%) and women (32%).
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Tiro Yotlhe ya Morunikakaretso ya Ngwaga wa 2021/.

src_text: TASEZ was established as special-purpose vehicle production zone with mandate to create employment opportunities and promote economic participation for small, medium and micro enterprises in the region.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dipoelo tsa ngwaga wa 2021/22 tsa tiro ya moruni mo go lekoleng gore Molao wa Botsamaisi jwa Madi Puso (PFMA) a obamelwa, mme dipoelo tseno di phasaladitswe ke Morunimogolo wa naga ya rona bong Mme Tsakani Maluleke ka Laboraro, 23 Ngwanaitseele 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go itlwaetsa go dira tiro ka maikarabelo go tla thusa gore kabo ya ditirelo mo setšhabeng tokafale”.

src_text: Its first phase of development was aimed at creating additional infrastructure and capacity within the FMCSA supply chain to support South Africa to be one of the only three hubs in the world to produce the next-generation Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: Kabinete etse tlhoko gore go ya ka dipoelo tsa tiro ya boruni go ditheo tsa puso ya naga le tsa diporofense tse di itsotsoropang mme le fa go le jalo santse tshwenngwa ke gorego dikarolo tsa kabo ya ditirelo tse di botlhokwa tse di tswelelang go goga maoto.

src_text: National Digital and Future Skills Conference.
tgt_text: Go ya ka tiro ya boruni jwa mafapha le 160, go bonagetse gore le 47 itsotsoropile mo go tokafatseng maemo ona fa le 12 boetse morago.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the National Digital and Future Skills Conference held in Umhlanga, KwaZulu-Natal from 22 to 23 November 2022, to strengthen our nation’s advances in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa.
tgt_text: Go fela jalo le ka tiro ya boruni jwa dikgwebo tsa puso di le 238, mo go bonagetse gore le 67 itsotsoropile mo go tokafatseng maemo ona fa le 34 boetse morago.

src_text: Hosted by the Department of Communications and Digital Technologies (DCDT) in partnership with the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ), the conference aimed to, among others, strengthen partnerships in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa, create and stimulate interest in digital and future skills, and explore digital skills training opportunities available for youth presented by the Fourth Industrial Revolution.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse boikano jo bo dirilweng ke puso jwa gore tla tsaya dikgato go baakanya matsapa a dirang gore maphata puso se nne le dipholo tse di itumedisang tsa boruni mme tla fedisa matsapa ano gore dipholo tsa ona tsa boruni nne tse di itumedisang.

src_text: The conference forged partnerships between government, business, civil society, international development organisations and youth organisations to take our nation forward into the digital era.
tgt_text: Letsholo la Pabalesego mo Pakeng ya Dikeresemose.

src_text: New Thuthuzela Care Centre in Limpopo.
tgt_text: Mo malobanyaneng puso thankgolotse Letsholo la Pabalesego mo Pakeng ya Dikeresemose la ngwaga wa 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go oketsa palo ya mapodisi go dira gore tirelo ya mapodisi bonagale.”.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the Thuthuzela Care Centre in the Dilokong Hospital at Dilokong Village in Driekop, Limpopo on Tuesday, 22 November.
tgt_text: Go dira gore baagi botlhe mmogo le bajanala ba se belaele le gore ba babalesege ka fa nageng ya rona mo pakeng ya dikeresemose le fa di setse di fetile, re tla dira gore tirelo ya mapodisi bonagale ka go gagamatsa matsholo go lwantshana le bosenyi ka go dirisana le maphata sepodisi le twantsho ya bosenyi mo tla gogwang kwa pele ke Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) le ditheo tse dingwe tsa twantsho ya bosenyi.

src_text: The one-stop facility offers services in support of victims of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and sexual crimes.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikueala mo baaging botlhe go dirisana le mapodisi go dira gore metse ya rona babalesege..  Jaaka mo mebileng ya naga ya rona pharakano simolola go susumoga, botlhe ba ba dirisang mebila go ikuelwa mo go bona gore ba ntshe matlho dinameng, mmogo le go obamela melao le melawana ya tsela e jaaka go se siane ka lebelo le le fetang leo ba le kwadileng mo mmileng oo.

src_text: The centre is the 62nd to be opened across the country and fulfils the commitment government made at the 2018 Presidential Summit Against GBVF to build more of such centres.
tgt_text: Go se itshiele fa kganna, go apara lepanta fa le ka fa sejanageng, go bula sekgala se se lekaneng fa pele ga sejanaga se se setseng morago mmogo le go ikhutsa morago ga diura tse dingwe le tse dingwe di le tharo mo lefelong le itseng gore le bolokesegile gore goge mowa fa le gore a kganna.

src_text: Auditor-General’s (AG) 2021/22 Consolidated General Report.
tgt_text: Ela tlhoko badirisi ba bangwe ba ditsela gore lotlhe le goroge koo le yang le babalesegile..  Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe go ntsha matlho dinameng mo pakeng eno ya dikeresemose go dira bonnete jwa gore bona le batho ba bangwe ba babalesegile, segolobogolo bana ba ba tlhokang go tlhokomelwa ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2021/22 Public Finance Management Act audit outcomes of the national and provincial government, which were released by AG Tsakani Maluleke on Wednesday, 23 November 2022 under the theme: “A culture of accountability will improve service delivery”.
tgt_text: Ka go ntsha matlho dinameng le go nna le maikarabelo, re ka kgona go dira gore rona le balelapa le masika mmogo le ditsala re nne le mekete e monate.

src_text: Cabinet noted the gradual upward trend in the audit outcomes of national and provincial government but expressed concern that key service delivery portfolios continued to receive poor outcomes.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Leokwane la Gase le le sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo (SAGHS).

src_text: Based on the completed audits of 160 departments, 47 departments had improved and 12 had regressed.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke ka fao go garetsweng ka katlego mokete wa SAGHS 2022 o neng tshwaretswe kwa Motsekapa ka la bo 28 le la bo 30 Ngwanaitseele 2022 o dirileng gore naga ya rona itlhagise jaaka lefelo le le ka kgonang go nna lefelo la maemo a kwa godimo mo lefatsheng la tlhagiso ya leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo.

src_text: Similarly, of the 238 public entities with completed audits, 67 had improved and 34 had regressed.
tgt_text: Mo go direng gore naga ya rona nne le matshwanedi go nna le lekala le le dirang bontle la leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, puso kwadile Leano la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Merero ya Leokwane la Gase leng le le buang ka maikemisetso naga mo motlakaseng wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa mmogo le mo polatinamong leng yona e botlhokwa mo thulaganyong ya motlakase wa leokwane la gase leng seo se tla bayang naga ya Aforika Borwa mo maemong a kwa godimo mo go gogeng kwa pele maraka montšhwa ono..  Ikonomi ya tshomarelo ya tlhago ke enngwe ya ditiro tse re samaganeng le tsona mo Leanong la Itharabologelo le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP) mo re samaganang le go ribolola ditsela tse dintšhwa tsa go godisa ikonomi ya naga rona tse go nang le kgonagalo ya gore di ka fetola ikonomi ya naga ya rona le go tlhola ditiro tse dintšhwa.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed government’s commitment to taking corrective measures to address the root causes that lead to poor audit outcomes and remove weaknesses to achieve clean audits.
tgt_text: Go Thankgololwa ga Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa Dithekenoloji tsa Maemo a kwa Godimo tse di Dirang Ditiro tse di Diriwang ke Batho.

src_text: Safer Festive Season campaign.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tirisanommogo e nnileng teng magareng ga DCDT, Tshwane University of Technology mmogo le University of Johannesburg leng se se dirileng gore go thankgololwe Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa AI kwa Johannesburg Business Schoo ka Laboraro, 30 Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: Government recently launched the 2022 Safer Festive Season campaign under the theme: “More boots on the ground towards enhanced police visibility.”.

To ensure the well-being and safety of all residents and tourists in our country during the festive season and beyond, heightened police visibility will include intensified and integrated crime-prevention and crime-combating operations by the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Sekolo seno se se tshwanang se le esi se tlisa diphetogo tse dintšhwa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa ka maitlhomo go tlhabolola thekenoloji.

src_text: Cabinet calls on all people to work with law-enforcement authorities to keep our communities safe.
tgt_text: Se tla dira gore ikonomi gole, sa samagana le matsapa botlhokatiro mmogo le go tlisa dilo tse dintle mo baaging.

src_text: As traffic volumes on our national roads increase, all road users are urged to be vigilant, and to obey traffic rules and regulations such as speed limits.
tgt_text: Setheo seno sa AI se tla godisa dithuto tsa go betla diroboto le tsa dipuo tsa go naya didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji ditaelo tse ga jaana leng dithuto tse di rebolelwang baithuti mo dikolong tsa ka fa nageng.

src_text: Do not drive while under the influence of alcohol, always wear your seatbelt, keep safe following distance and stop at safe place to rest after at least every three hours of driving.
